79a7('dul ba): dbyar gyi rnyed pa ni nye dga'i yin no// 'jig rten pa ni yon tan la dga' ba yin pas bdag nyid dang / bu dang chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ 
79a8('dul ba): bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge slong dgon pa rnams zas la mgron du 'bod par byed do// dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la khyim rnams su dong ba dang / ma byin par len pa rnams
79b1('dul ba): kyis gtsug lag khang nas brkus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bsgo bcad la lde mig blangs la 'dong bar bya'o// ma byin par len pa rnams kyis lde mig byas te brkus nas/ 
79b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srungs ma'i dge slong bzhag la 'dod par bya'o// de la bsod snyoms kyis brel pa med par bya'o// ma byin pa len pa rnams kyis dge slong gzhan khrid de 'ongs
79b3('dul ba): nas/ des sgo phyes zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas sam rims med ces brda skya'o// gal te rims dang bcas so zhes zer na mi dbye'o// 'on te rims med
79b4('dul ba): ces smra na dbye bar bya'o// gzhan yang dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar gnyen pa gzhag par bya'o// 
79b5('dul ba): zhes gsungs pa/ dge slong rnams kyis lo ma ltar mnyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lo ma ltar mnyen pa ni khyi yin te/ 
79b6('dul ba): de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o// dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang / gtsug lag khang sder mos brud cing / bshang ba dang gci bas ma
79b7('dul ba): rung bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas dge slong khyi sel ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong khyi srel pas nang par sngar langs la/ 
79b8('dul ba): mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang byul bar bya ste/ sder mos brud pa gang yin pa de bsnyam par bya'o// bshang ba dang gcis pa yang phyag par bya'o// dge slong khyi srel pas kun tu
80a1('dul ba): spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gtsug lag khang
80a2('dul ba): zhig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pa dang / ci tsam na de dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gzhan zhig 'ongs nas/ nye dgas bsams pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas
80a3('dul ba): brtan byed byed pa las gnas brtan gnyis par bya 'am/ bdag gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'gro'o snyam ste/ gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/ de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba
80a4('dul ba): dang / de'i gnas brtan gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa de de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi yin nas des bsams pa// bdag gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la bdag gi rnyed pa
80a5('dul ba): de na yang der zad na spogs med par dge 'dun gyi gnas pa/ rten gyis ci zhig bya zhes/ de slar rings pa rings par gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang / gnas mal phyed
80a6('dul ba): bskos tsam na gtsug lag khang du byin nas des smras pa/ rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang bskos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to zhes ma bskos pa dang / nye dgos
80a7('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam/ ci rgan rims ji lta bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig ces pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
80a8('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dge 'dun gyi 'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la/ song ba zhig yin na/ de'i gnas mal rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin
80b1('dul ba): du bsko bar bya'o// gzhan gyis ni gar bab pa bzhin du'o// nye dgas lhags par chags par gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ gtsug lag khang gnyis su dbya ba
80b2('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas te/ des dbyar gnas nas/ rnyed pa mnos pa dang / cig nas kyang mthob/ cig shos nas kyang mthob nas/ gnas mal 'ged pa'i dge slong rnams la kha zer ba'i ska
80b3('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas de'i rnyed pa byin cig/ dge slong rnams kyis gtsug
80b4('dul ba): lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o// gcig nas byin pa dang / dge slong
80b5('dul ba): gzhan rnams spong par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer khar byed/ gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas na/ ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin/ dge slong bcom ldan 'das
80b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas phyed phyed sbyin par bya ste/ dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gnyis su gnas par dam mi bca'o// dam bca' bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du
80b7('dul ba): 'gyur ro// khyim bdag cig gi gtsug lag khang gnyis brtsig tu bcug ste/ cig ni dgon pa pa rnams kyi yin no// cig shos ni grong mtha' pa rnams kyi yin no// khyim bdag de'i kun tu spyod pa
80b8('dul ba): ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong re re la ras yug chen re re bskon pa yin pas/ de ras yug chen rnams khyer te/ dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du seng dang / 1
81a1('dul ba): dgas dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed pa 'bul lo zhes thos nas/ des dga' bo la spring ba/ gal te 'di rnyeng pa 'bul na skal pa nos shig ces smras nas// 
81a2('dul ba): de rings par dgon pa pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsams pa'o ni gom stangs dang sbyar na dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang der song gis/ da ji ltar byas na rung
81a3('dul ba): snyam pa las ri shig grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du phul la/ phyis 'dir 'bul lo snyam nas/ de phyir log nas ras yug po che brim par brtsams pa na/ dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang / 
81a4('dul ba): khyim bdag gis ras yug po che gcig byin no// yang ba dazad pa dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyo dang la ras yug po che phul lags na/ ci yang bzhed dam/ des
81a5('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du nye dag sa dbyar gnas pas de'i skal pa nod do// khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi
81a6('dul ba): laleg nas sbyin pa la bsngags pa mdzad pas/ rang gi lag kho na nas 'bul lo// de skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// nye dgas bsams pa/ khyim bdag de ring zhig thog na grong gi mthar
81a7('dul ba): ma srong grang snyam du bsams nas/ grong mtha' pa'i gtsug lag khang du song nas dga' bo la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi ras yug po che mnos sam/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras so// khyim
81a8('dul ba): bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du song ste/ ras yug po che brims nas song ngo // nye dgas yang slar dgon pa pa'i gtsug lag khang du brgyugs na/ ji tsam na ras
81b1('dul ba): yug po che rnams brim zin pa dang / des gtsug lag khang gnyis kyis rnyed pa la lhag par chags pa las rnyed pa las nyams nas/ mya ngan byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags 'don to// dge slong rnams the
81b2('dul ba): tshem skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa nye dga' lhag par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
81b3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang / lhag par chags pas zas par byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba
81b4('dul ba): 'bab chu'i dogs gnyis na gtsug lag khang gnyis shi ngag yod de/ cig na ni dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'o// cig gsho ngas na ni bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi'o// ci tsam na khyi gar+b+ha'i sgra
81b5('dul ba): shes pa zhig yod de/ de gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas/ dge 'du na gyi rnyed pa yod pa'i gtsug lag khang du song na/ de la dge slong kha cig gis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin pa dang / de de
81b6('dul ba): zos nas gsod snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos nas/ dga' dgur 'gro'o// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa rnams la glo bur
81b7('dul ba): gyi rnyed pa zhig byung nas/ de rnams kyis sngar gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / khyi des gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas/ chu rgal bar brtsams te/ des dbus su phyin pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa can gyi gtsug lag
81b8('dul ba): khang gi gaN+DI yang brdungs nas de spro ba med nas slar log par brtsams pa las/ de chu'i rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas gnyis ka las nyams por gyur to// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe
82a1('dul ba): de'i dus kyi khyi gaN+DI'i sgra shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to// da ltar yang lhag
82a2('dul ba): par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis lhag par chags par mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sdom la/ 'thab dang nad pa
82a3('dul ba): rdzogs pa dang // nub mo'i dus dang ka shi dang // shing dang gsil ma 'dug gnas dang // cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa
82a4('dul ba): 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab bkrol bgyid pa/ 'tshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ brtson par bgyi dad pa/ bgyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams
82a5('dul ba): mchi zhing de dag ngo che ma mchis pas 'tho 'tsham pa'i slad du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid/ dran par bgyid do zhe sa thos na/ de rnams kyis de dag la/ ji ltar bsgrub par
82a6('dul ba): bgyi/ nye bar 'khor dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab bkrol byed pa rnams 'ong ngo // zhes thos na gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang gnas mal gzung ba drug bya'o// 
82a7('dul ba): gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang / dbyar bgyi'o// gnas mal gzung na drug gang zhe na/ gtsug lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor
82a8('dul ba): thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag
82b1('dul ba): khang bskos shig ces zer na/ 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig zhe na/ 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran skos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no//

82b3('dul ba): brjod par bya'o// de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na/ gang la nyes pa skyed par 'gyur/ de nas bdo ba rnams med/ phyir rgol ba rnams med/ mi mdza' ba rnams med nas/ de'i 'og tu rgan rims ji

83a1('dul ba): gnas khang de de'i yin par bskos pa dang / des 'di phyung nas 'dir bzhag go// 'phags pa dag bdag cag khyim pa lags kyang nad pa rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir/ khyim nas/ 
83a2('dul ba): mi byin na/ khyed cag rab tu byung la/ ston pa yang thugs rje can yin na/ de ji ltar nad pa phyir 'byin par byed ces de rnams smod par byed gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/

85a1('dul ba): gnas brtan gnas gartan rnams/ spro ba dang bcas pas/ 'dul ba gdon par brtsams so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor 'dul ba'i gleng gzhi dang byung ba la

85b3('dul ba): pa'i dge slong gis spyod lam rnam pa gsum gyis lung nod par bya ste/ gal te lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong 'chag par lung nod pa'i dge slong 'ongs la/ gsar bu zhig pa yin na des phyag byas la/ 
85b4('dul ba): khams snyoms sa mo zhes dris nas/ lus btud de sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o// ji ste ches rgan pa zhig yin na des khom so snyoms
85b5('dul ba): sam zhes dris nas/ lus btud de sems drag pos gus pa/ dang bcas pas gom pa bsri zhing lung mnod par bya'o// / ji ste 'greng ba na 'ongs la gsar bu zhig yin pa des
85b6('dul ba): phyag byas la/ khams snyoms sam zhes dris nas/ stan ches dma' ba la cog tsog por 'dug la/ sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o// ji ste rgan pa zhig yin
85b7('dul ba): na/ des khams snyoms sam zhes dris la/ lus btud nas sems drang pos gus pa dang bcas pas lung mnod par bya'o// 'greng ba la ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dug pa dang nyal ba la yang sbyar bar
85b8('dul ba): bya'o// lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gis shin tu gom pa dang / legs par byang ba dang / the tsom med par byas nas/ lung dbog par bya'o// lung nod pas kyang shin tu byung ba dang / shin tu
86a1('dul ba): zin pa dang / the tsom med par byas nas lung mnod par bya'o// lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong dang lung nod pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin
86a2('dul ba): yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// drug sde'i dge slong rnams ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nub mo phyin nas/ de rnams 'grogs
86a3('dul ba): bshes ji lta ba bzhin du/ dge slong rnams kyis ngal sor bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dug ste ci byed/ gnas mal bsko ba bos shig/ de dag gis
86a4('dul ba): smras pa ci dgos/ gnas mal skor gzhug mod/ de rnam das kyis smras pa/ gnas mal yod kyis bde bar nyol dacig dang / nam nangs nas bgo'o// de rnams kyis kun nas
86a5('dul ba): dkris pas smras pa/ ci khyed cag ston pa bzhugs bzhi na du bstan pa nub par byed dam/ gal te khyed la 'gye da pa yod na rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal skos
86a6('dul ba): shig/ de rnams kha stobs can yin pas gnas mal sko ba bred nas gnas mal bskos pa dang / drug sde de rnams kyis rgan rims bzhin du gnas mal mnos te nyal lo// ji tsam gzhon
86a7('dul ba): rims kyi bar du sgo ba de'i bar du na mnangs so// drug sde rnams myur ba myur bar langs te smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas mal bsdus shig 'dong ngo // dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/ che
86a8('dul ba): dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis nub gcig gi phyir/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mtha' dag nub mo mtho tsam 'am/ kye ma'o// khyed cag 'di nyid du 'dug shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga'
86b1('dul ba): mnyan yod du 'dong ngo // 'di dag ni rlung nang can yin no zhes byas nas dong ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
86b2('dul ba): dge slong dag de lta bas na/ nub mo gnas mal bsgo bar mi bya'o// gal te nub mo lhags na 'grogs pa shes ci lta ba bzhin du so sor ngal sor gzhug par bya'o// yul zhig nas dge slong mchod rten la
86b3('dul ba): phyag byed pa zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs na de'i spyod yul la mi mkhas pas nang par sngar langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnam
86b4('dul ba): kyi rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas mnyan yod du bsod snyom/ sa la zhugs te/ de bsod snyoms spyod pa dro bab tu nye nas de nyid du ra ba zhig gi drung du 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsam
86b5('dul ba): so// khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin yang mchod rten phyag 'tshal zhing lam de nas song ba las des de mthong nas spras pa/ 'phags bkun nas mdzes pa'i bstan pa las
86b6('dul ba): rab tu byung ba yin na mi rigs pa mdzad dam ci/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dro la bab tu nye ba ma mthong ngam 'di la mi rigs pa ci zhig yod/ des smras pa/ khyod ci'i slad du bdag gi khyim du mi
86b7('dul ba): byon/ khyod kyi ming ci/ mgon med zas sbyin no// kho bos mdo sde de dang de rnams las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes thos pa zhig yod kyi khyod kyang mi shes la khyim yang mi shes so// khyim
86b8('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsams pa/ dge slong 'di ni lam ring po nas 'ongs la rgyus mi shes pa zhig yin te/ gdon mi za bar bdag kyang mi shes la bdag gi khyim yang mi shes kyis// / 
87a1('dul ba): 'di lta bu la ji ltar byas na rung ba/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas brtsig par
87a2('dul ba): bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dor song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug
87a3('dul ba): nos/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong glo bur pa spyod yul mo 'tshal po zhig bsod snyoms spyod pa na dro yol tu nye nas ra bzhag
87a4('dul ba): gi drung du g.yar zas kyi bgyi ba bgyid de/ ma dad pa rnams yan/ lag 'dis 'phags pa rnams la smod par 'gyur ro// / gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis gang yang
87a5('dul ba): mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas brtsig par bgyi ste/ gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der bsod snyoms longs spyad par 'gyur ro// 
87a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na rjes su gnang gis brtsigs shig/ des gang yang mnyan yod nas/ rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bar gyi bar bar du bsti gnas dag
87a7('dul ba): brtsigs nas dge slong gang zhig gang du dro bab pa de der zas kyi bya ba byed do// dge slong gzhan dag chus phongs par gyur nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis der khron pa brkos nas/ 
87a8('dul ba): tshab gsum dang 'bras bu gsum gyis shing rta bkang ste btab paso// chu de ro phun sum tshogs par gyur to// zhes 'jig rten thams cad du grags pa skyo bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas lhags
87b1('dul ba): pas/ dge slong rnams kyis bgags pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed cag la bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ chab
87b2('dul ba): 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong khyed 'gog par mdzad dam zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dgag
87b3('dul ba): par mi bya'o// bud med dge slong rnams la chu slong ba na dge slong rnams kyis ma byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med ni kun nas
87b4('dul ba): zhags pa ste/ bdud kyi 'ching ba yin no zhes gsungs pas// dge slong rnams bud med la chu sbyin par byed pa na chags par gyur to// ci tsam na bud med byad bzhin dang
87b5('dul ba): lang cos rgyags pa zhig dge slong gzhon nu zhig la shin tu cha gas pas de la chu bslangs pa dang / de yang de la cha gas pas/ bcings pa'i sems kyis slar bzlog kyang rgyun
87b6('dul ba): ma bcad par bsgugs te/ de yang de la rtog bzhin 'thungs pa las chu de glor song nas shi'o// don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs
87b7('dul ba): de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bud med gang zhig chags pas bcings pa'i sems kyis/ dge slong // 
87b8('dul ba): la chu slong ba de la rang gis sbyin par mi bya'o// bud med la chu rgyun ma chad par sbyin par mi bya zhing snyim pa khong la 'thung shig cis bsgo la/ skabs skabs su bcad cing blugs par bya'o// 
88a1('dul ba): gzhan du na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'dul ba bzhi/ bam po don bdun pa// de'i tshe gang dag bsod snyoms kyi thog ma/ rgyal bu
88a2('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal du dbul ba rnams kyis de nyid du dbul bar brtsams pa drug sde rnams kyis thos nas de rnams bsti gnas su dong sde 'dug nas ka bsod snyoms kyi thog mar khyer te 'ong ba gang yin
88a3('dul ba): pab de lo rmas te gal te'o thug yin na ni lhung bzed zad par byed de/ ci ste chu thug yin na ni rdzu 'phrul chen po'i dge 'dun dang / mthu chen po'i dge 'dun la phul cig ces smra'o// de bzhin du hwags kyi
88a4('dul ba): bca' ba la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya ste/ don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhog 'phyas byedakha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom
88a5('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ dge slong gis gzhon gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o// kha brngam byed na 'gal tshabs
88a6('dul ba): du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gzhan gyi rnyed pa la kha brngam mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong kha cig dgos pa zhig la gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ste/ de rnams
88a7('dul ba): der phyin pa na drol bab kyang 'gyod pas longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ched
88a8('dul ba): du bsams te 'gro bar mi bya'o// ma bsams par 'ongs pa las gal te dro la bab par gyur na longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// phongs pa dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na
88b1('dul ba): dge slong dag gtsug lag khang gzhan du dong ba las de na dge slong de rnams longs spyod pa mthong nas yang bza' bar 'dod pa las 'gyod pas longs mi spyod pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis ba/ 
88b2('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang snga mar de blangs la de yang gal te tshad med pa zhig tu 'drem na blang bar bya'o// ji ste dge
88b3('dul ba): slong tshad yod par byas pa zhig yin na blang bar mi bya'o// len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ri nag po la gshegs so// 
88b4('dul ba): de'i tshe ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang na bo so gnyis nga gnas te/ de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong nga gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing
88b5('dul ba): gshegs shing 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ ston pa'i spyan sngar dge slong ngo tsha med pa dang / 'dzes pa med pa rnams kyis bdag cag
88b6('dul ba): la gleng bar byed dran par byed par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang chen po gcig ma gtogs pa dge slong rnams las brtsams te/ gnas mal
88b7('dul ba): bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba yang drug bya'o// gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang dbyar bgyi'o// gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug
88b8('dul ba): lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nyo 'khor thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga' ra ba'i/ 
89a1('dul ba): nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang skos shig ces smras pa dang 'di bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya zhing khang phran skos shig ce na/ 'di yang
89a2('dul ba): bskos zin no// gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor bskos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no// khang phran gyi nye 'khor bskos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no// kun dga' ra ba skos shig ce na 'di yang
89a3('dul ba): bskos zin no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig ce na 'di yang bskos zin no zhes brjod par bya ste/ de rnams gnas med de mi gnas na ngo tsha med pa/ 'dzem pa med par bdag cag la gleng
89a4('dul ba): pabar mi 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug byas so// ci// tsam na bcom ldan 'das ri nag po la gshegs na de
89a5('dul ba): gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug lag khang ni snga nas bsdogs zin to// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang lnga na pa dag gnas mal dang / gtsug lag khang skos
89a6('dul ba): shig/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gtsug lag khang sngar bskos zin no// khang phran skos shig de yang bskos zin no// gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor skos shig de yang bskos zin no// khang
89a7('dul ba): phran gyi nye 'khor skos shig de yang bskos zin no// kun dga' ra ba skos shig de yang bskos zin no// kun dga' ra ba'i nye 'khor skos shig de yang bskos zin no// gang gi phyir de gnyis kyis
89a8('dul ba): gnas thams cad ma bskos pa dang / de nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po byung ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste/ mkhyen
89b1('dul ba): bzhin du rmed kyi mi mkhyen par mi rmed/ dus su rmed kyi/ dus las yol bar mi rmed/ don dang ldan pa rmed kyi/ don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang / 
89b2('dul ba): ldan pa ma yin pa rmed pa la chu lon gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don dang ldan pa rmed pa de la dus mkhyen pa yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
89b3('dul ba): 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa/ kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i nang na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mthon po dang sgra chen por grags pa 'di ci zhig yin/ des gsol pa/ 
89b4('dul ba): dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug bgyis nas// dge slong rnams kyis gnas mal ma thob par gyur te/ 
89b5('dul ba): des na kun dga' ra ba'i nang na/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra mtho/ na po dang / sgra chen po 'di grags lags so// btso/ ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo
89b6('dul ba): ngas 'thab bkrol byed pa'i dge slong rnams la dgongs nas gnas mal bsko ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug mdzad kyi/ rang bzhin du gnas pa la ni ma yin pas/ de lta bas na dge
89b7('dul ba): slong rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams las brtsams te/ gnas mal bsgo ba gsum dang / gnas mal gzung ba drug mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs
89b8('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu yul ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ grong med pa'i dgon po zhig tu nub mo dgongs btab bo// drug sde rnams
90a1('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir shing bzang po zhig bzhag nas/ shing bzang po gzhan ni rang rang gis bzung ngo // dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis ni/ 
90a2('dul ba): shing khong stong dag thob bo// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsol rgyal gyis thos nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag gzhi dang chas te bsunas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas na/ 
90a3('dul ba): dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la brtags na/ ji tsam na drug sde rnams ni shing bzang po dag gi drung na gnas la gnas brtan gnas brten rnams kyi ni shing khong skyong rnams mthong
90a4('dul ba): nas/ des mjal to zhes byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das dgang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
90a5('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal
90a6('dul ba): rigs spyi bo nas dbang skur pa/ gtso bo lags te yul mtha' dag nas 'byung ba'i rin po che rnams las/ thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos po gang lags pa de ni bdag gi lags la/ lhag
90a7('dul ba): ma rnams las ji ltar 'tshol ba bzhin du/ mchis brang dang gzhon nu dang blon po dang khrom gyi ru ba rnams kyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags/ 
90a8('dul ba): 'phags pa ko'u din+ya dang shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang 'od bsrung dang kun dga' bo dang nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams ni/ zhugs shing khong stong rnams kyi drung na
90b1('dul ba): mchis la/ drug sde rnams kyi ni zhugs shing bzang ches lags kyis/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste zhugs shing la yang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin gyi/ bca' ba
90b2('dul ba): mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung
90b3('dul ba): bas gnang bar rigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs nas song ngo // byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
90b4('dul ba): dag de lta bas na shing rnams dang / sbrang bu dang gsing ma rnams kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis shing dang / sgang bu dang gsing ma rnam
90b5('dul ba): kyang rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin bsgo bar bya'o// zhes gsu/ ngas pa dang / dge slong rnams rang nyid sko bar byed nas / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang sgo
90b6('dul ba): ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis phal pa las bskos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong gtsug lag khang 'god par ma skos
90b7('dul ba): pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag
90b8('dul ba): khang bskos pa dang ma bskos pa mi shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// skos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa ni
91a1('dul ba): gtsug lag khang sko bar ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug
91a2('dul ba): gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / gtsug lag khang bskos pa dang ma bsgos pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa ni gtsug lag khang bsko bar ma bsgos pa ni bsko bar bya/ 
91a3('dul ba): bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// bsko ba ni 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te/ gaN+DI brdungs la dris pa'i tshigs gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun
91a4('dul ba): thams cad tshegs shing 'thun par gyur pa dang / r-i shig/ thog ma spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang bsko bar spro'am/ de gal te spro bar
91a5('dul ba): gyur na de spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas dge slong gci/ ga gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o// dge 'dun btsun/ pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang sko ba dge
91a6('dul ba): slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko ba spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus lo bab cing bzed na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun
91a7('dul ba): gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bsko ba mdzad do// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las bya ba ni dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gtsug lag khang sko ba dge slong/ 
91a8('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang sko bar spro nas 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang
91b1('dul ba): dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dri gtsug lag khang sko bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gan
91b2('dul ba): nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di gtsug lag khang sko bar bskos te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to// gtsug lag khang 'god pa ji lta ba bzhin du
91b3('dul ba): zas la sko ba dang thugs pa 'drim pa dang / bag chos 'drim pa dang / phan tshegs 'drim pa dang / snod dpyad pa 'drub pa dang / gos sbed pa dang / gos 'ged pa dang / dbyar gyi ras chen
91b4('dul ba): sbed pa dang / dbyar gyi ras chen 'ged pa dang / mngag gzhug da pa dang / mdzes chos pa yang de bzhin to// chos lnga dang lnga ngan pa'i dge slong ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// bskos
91b5('dul ba): pa ni 'byung bar bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro/ kha dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi
91b6('dul ba): mdzes pa mi shes te/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar mi bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya'o// yang chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos pa
91b7('dul ba): ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas
91b8('dul ba): mi 'gro ba dang / mdzes pa dang mi mdzes pa shes pa ste/ chos 'di lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong mdzes chos par ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya'o// bskos pa ni dbyung bar mi bya'o// gtsug
92a1('dul ba): lag khang dang zas 'geng dang // thug pa 'dri ma dang bag chos dang // phran tshegs snod byang sbed pa dang // chos gos gnyis dang de bzhin du// dbyar gyi ras chen sbeng ba dang / 
92a2('dul ba): 'ged pa dag dang mngag gzhug dang // de bzhin du ni mdzes chos te// gang zag bcu gnyis yin par bshad// gnas mal gyi gzhi rdzogs so// / zod pa zhi par
92a3('dul ba): byed pa'i gzhi'i sdom la/ 'thab dang 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa dang // rtsa ba gang dang dge pa dang // 'gyed pa yin la rtsod min dang // 'gyed pa dus ni zhi ba dang // 'gyed pa mngon sum zhi ba dang / 
92a4('dul ba): tshul shing dag ni blangs pa yis// gdams ngag med pa mdo na gsum dang // dran dang ma mos 'dul 'os dang / de yi ngo bo tshal gzhug dang // rtswa bkram lta bur 'ong ba yis/ 
92a5('dul ba): dge 'dun dag ni 'thun pa yis// de bzhin bya ba'i rtsod pa ni// nye bar zhi bar bya'o zhes// drang srong chen pos rab tu gsungs// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i
92a6('dul ba): gzhi n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya rnams bden pa la bkod pa de'i tshe/ de rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir// dus gsum du
92a7('dul ba): 'dong bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de rnams la yang dang yang du chos 'chad par mdzad do// rgyal po zas gtsang gi kun tu spyod pa ni shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ bcom ldan
92a8('dul ba): 'das la blta ba'i phyir/ dus gsum du 'gro bar byed do// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i grong la bzhugs nas sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta
92b1('dul ba): bu'i chos bshad pa ni/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan pa bstan pa'i chos nyan par byed do// rgyal po zas gtsang yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir
92b2('dul ba): rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ des chos mnyan nas song ngo // de nas shAkya ming chen gyis
92b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'odas kyi spyan snga nas chos mnyan te dad pa skyes nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ smras pa/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas/ kye ma'o chos/ kye ma'o dge 'dun/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras
92b4('dul ba): bu dang bcas pa yin no// ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas smras dpa/ rje'i sras de ci lags/ des smras pa/ deng bcom nga ldan 'das kyis 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du 'di 'dra ba'i
92b5('dul ba): chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas srog chags brgya stong / phrag du mas khyad par chen po rtogs so// des spras pa/ rje'i sras sangs rgyas byung ba ni bdag 'bras bu dang
92b6('dul ba): bcas pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de med de/ sangs rgyas byung ba ni khyed cag kho na la 'bras bu dang bcas legs kyis/ bdag cag la ni ma lags so// ci'i phyir 'di
92b7('dul ba): ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba ni/ skyes pa rnams kyi phyir lags so// bud med rnams kyi phyir ni ma lags so// des smras pa/ bzangs mo de skad ma smra shig/ bcom ldan
92b8('dul ba): 'das ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / thugs brtse ba yin gyis song shig dang / khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas chos thos par 'gyur ro// des smras pa
93a1('dul ba): lha shAkya'i tshogs kyis bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dus sum du bzhud la/ lha'i mdun du mngon sum du bdag gis chos mnyan pa g.yar che lagra
93a2('dul ba): so// 'di ltar gal te lha lnga dro lan cig bzhud na bdag gis kyang slar snga dro bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan par bgyi'o// shAkya ming chen gyis bsams pa/ lha la gsol gyis 'gro'o// snyam
93a3('dul ba): ba las yang bsam pa rang gi chung ma'i ched la lha la gsol ba byed ni mi phod kyis/ lha ni skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la bkur bsti mang du byed de/ de'i tshig nyan par 'gyur bas/ de la don
93a4('dul ba): 'di rig par bya'o snyam nas/ de skyes dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go/ 'u ta mi gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la don de smras pa dang / des
93a5('dul ba): smras pa/ bka' bzhin tshal lha la gsol ba bgyi'o// de nas shAkya ming chen khyim du song nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma rnams la smras pa dang / de nas shAkya rnams kyi chung ma
93a6('dul ba): dang / gzhan dag gi chung ma rnams skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi la 'di skad ces smras so// go'u ta mi mkhyen par mdzod cig/ 
93a7('dul ba): bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du snyan pa brnyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ 
93a8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das las snyan pa snyan pa'i chos nyan to zhes thos nas/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das las chos de thos par 'tshal gyis/ bdag cag gi phyir lha la ci nas kyang lha ni snga dro bcom
93b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhud la bdag cag kyang slad dro mchi bar gsol ba mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ phu nu mo dag khyod kyis sems bskyed pa legs te// rgyal po zas gtsang la brtag gis
93b2('dul ba): skad cig sdod cig/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi rgyal po zas gtsang ga na ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzod cig/ bdag
93b3('dul ba): gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la bzhugs nas/ snyan pa snyan pa'i chos sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi dngas ma lta bu bshad pa na/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dbang po rnams mi g.yo bas/ 
93b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la rnyan brnyan pa'i chos nyan no zhes thos/ shA kya'i mchis grang rnams kyis kyang de skad thos nas/ de rnams chos nyan par 'tshal na/ lha ni snga dro bcom ldan
93b5('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngar gshegs pa'i rigs so// bdag gis kyang shAkya'i mchis brangs rnams ded de/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis spyan sngar slad dro mchi bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du/ 
93b6('dul ba): zhe na/ nasnga dro ni de rnams sdum pa'i bgyi ba dag bgyid pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchi ba'i skabs ma mchis so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe skye dgu'i bdag me
93b7('dul ba): chen mo go'u ta mis tshig smras pa/ de'i tshe lus kyi spu zing zhes byed nas langs te/ re shig skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i tshig gi lan ma byin pa de'i bar du mi 'dug pa yin pas des mgo bos btud nas
93b8('dul ba): smras pa go'u ta mi bka' bzhin 'tshal/ de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi shAkya'i chung ma lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir n+ya gro d+ha'i kun
94a1('dul ba): dga'ar bar song ngo // ji tsam na shAkya'i ming chen gyi chung ma yang rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ de na lhan cig song ste/ gzugs dang lang tshe dang ldan zhing rgyan thas/ 
94a2('dul ba): cad kyis brgyan pas/ 'dod chags dang ma bral ba dag chags pa skye bar zhugs pa de/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas/ smras pa/ sring mo re shig khyod kyis rang bzhin gyis gzugs
94a3('dul ba): nyid kyang bzang mo blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin no// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khyod rgyan gyis brgyan te 'dir 'ong ba gang yin pa de ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas te/ 
94a4('dul ba): bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba kho na yang yin no zhes de la de skad ces smras pa/ dang / ngo tsha ba snying la phog pas spyi bo smad nas mtha' gcig
94a5('dul ba): tu song ste/ rgyan rnams bkrol nas sems khongs su chu/ da cing 'dug pa las/ de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo skye da ma zhes bya ba dang / de lhan cig chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs
94a6('dul ba): pas/ des de la bos te smras pa/ bskyed ma song la rgyan 'di dag khyim du gzhog la shog shig/ de rings par song nas des khyim du bzhag ste slar 'ongs so// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen
94a7('dul ba): mo go'u ta mi 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos bshad pa mdzad do// chos
94a8('dul ba): bshad pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ ji tsam na shAkya'i bu mo zhig mgul pa na mu tig gi do shal btags pa la myur ba myur bar lta zhing lag pas nom par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
94b1('dul ba): mi rtag pa dang / ldan pa'i chos bshad par brtsams so// 'on kyang nges chos la mi gtod kyi mu tig gi do shal kho na la rtog par byed do// ming chen gyi chung ma dam pas/ shAkya'i bu mo mgul
94b2('dul ba): pan mu tig gi do shal rtag pa la myur ba myur bar rtog par byed pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ nyon mongs 'di 'du byed rnams 'di ltar mi rtag par bshad na mu tig
94b3('dul ba): gi do shal 'di la lhag par chags te myur ba myur bar rtag tu ci yod/ gal te bdag gi mu tig gi phreng ba mthong na 'di'i rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// snyam du bsams nas/ 
94b4('dul ba): mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo bskyang ma la smras pa/ bskyed ma song la kho mo'i mu tig gi do shal myur du khyer te shog/ shig/ de chos nyan pa la sems bsdus pas/ de 'di snyam
94b5('dul ba): du sems te/ kyi hud 'di 'dra ba'i chos 'chad na/ bdag rje mos mngags pas chos kyi bar chad byung bar gyur te/ mngon bran gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa ni raM sdug snyam du bsam
94b6('dul ba): nas/ sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde bas gdungs pas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang yang sdig pas de ring rgyal zhal blta ba dang / bde gshegs zhal nas dri med chos mnyan mi 'thob
94b7('dul ba): pa/ bran mangs zhal dbang sdug bsngal mang po tha chad de// bdag gi mtsho ba sngon byas las kyis thob pa ngan// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bu mo bskyed ma 'di ni sngon gyi
94b8('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin mod kyis/ tshe cung zhig yod pas 'di 'khor ba'i brtson ra nas dbyung bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis ni 'gro ba la// dge
95a1('dul ba): ma skye ba byung ba ni// 'jig pa yin par bsams nas su// ngas gsungs pa yi dge ba la// brtson 'grus bskyed nas mnyan par bya// zhes bris nas byin no// de nas
95a2('dul ba): bu mo bskyed ma dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / rang ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ tshigs su bcad pas smras bzhin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kho nas song ba dang / las rnams bskal
95a3('dul ba): pa brgyar yang yin// chud mi za ba'ang tshegs dang dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba yin pas/ tshe cung zhig yod pa'i las tshogs pa rnyed de/ 
95a4('dul ba): drus ma zhig gis bsad do// de sangs rgyas la sems ma dngon par dad par byas te shi bas/ sing ga la'i gling du sing ga la'i rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes
95a5('dul ba): par gyur te/ gang gi nyi ma la nying mtshams sbyar ba de kho na'i nyin par mu tig gi char pa bab po// rgyal pos blta sa mkhan rnams bkug ste/ smras pa dang / de rnams kyis
95a6('dul ba): smras pa/ lha 'di ni sems can zhig btsun mo'i lhums su zhugs pa'i de'i mthu lags so// ci tsam na mngal gyi smin par bya ba'i phyir te/ sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi grags cing
95a7('dul ba): grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dang / sman pas stan pa'i kha zas ha cang kha ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang skyur ba mi yin pa dang / ha cang lan tsha can ma yin pa dang / ha cang
95a8('dul ba): mngar ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang rtsub pa ma yin po dang / ha cang bskab ma yin pa dang / kha basbyar ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mang ra ba dang nub pa dang / bska ba rnams spangs pa'i kha zas kyi
95b1('dul ba): bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dang se mo ngos lus brgyan nas/ lha'i bu mo dga' tshal na rgyu ba bzhin du khri dang khri nas/ khri'u nas khri'ur 'gro zhing / 'og gi sa la 'bab par mi byed do// de zla ba
95b2('dul ba): brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/ gang gi nyi ma la bcas pa de nyid kyi nyin par yang mu tig gi char babs nas/ rgyal pos bsam
95b3('dul ba): pa/ 'di ji ltar bu mo'i mthus mu tig gi char bab pa ni/ de nyid kyi mu tig tu 'gyur ro zhes des de nyid la byin no// de nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i bcas ston rgya cher byas nas
95b4('dul ba): bu mo'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dog par byed do// blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'di'i mthu sa mu tig gi char bab pas de bas na bu mo'i ming mu tig
95b5('dul ba): can zhes gdags so// zhes de'i ming mu tig can zhes bya bar btags te/ bu mo mu tig can ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis
95b6('dul ba): dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse 'grogs kyi ma ma gnyis te/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying po dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag
95b7('dul ba): gtso bo gtso bo dag gis srid par byed/ skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do// de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa'i tshe rang gi rigs dang 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang / 
95b8('dul ba): gnas pas rgyal po nang bcas pas lhag par bkur bsti byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis/ nor bsgrubs pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrub ste/ rgya
96a1('dul ba): mtsho'i chen por zhugs pa dang / de rnams gru bo che phan phun med par rlung gi shugs kyi sing ga la'i gling du phyin to// de nas snod rnams mkhos su phab ste/ rgyal po'i pho
96a2('dul ba): brang dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu drang btab bo// de rnams kyis mtshan mo'i thun tha mal ched du brjod pa dang / pha rol 'gro byed dang / bden pa mthong ba dang / gnas brtan gyi tshogs su bcad
96a3('dul ba): pa dang / gnas brtan ma'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / ri gnas kyi tshigs su bcad pa dang / thub pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang / don gyi tshoms kyi mdo sde rnams rgyas par 'don pa la zhugs
96a4('dul ba): pa/ mu tig can khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas skar khung nas dathos nas/ de nas de des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha yul dbus kyi tshong pa dag mchis nas tshig snyan par len to// 
96a5('dul ba): rgyal pos blon po dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag glu mkha na rnams khug shig/ de rnams bkug pa dang / mu tig can gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag yul dbus kyi rol mo
96a6('dul ba): ci 'dra ba/ kho mos mnyan gyis long shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo bdag cag ni rol mo mkhan ma lags te/ bdag cag ni mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rlung gi shugs kyis 'dir mchis
96a7('dul ba): pa lags te/ bdag cag gis mtshan mo'i mthun tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi gsung bton to// mu tig can gyis sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas snying dga' bas pa spu tham
96a8('dul ba): cad zing zhes byed de/ de ngo mtshar skyes nas dris pa/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di sti yin/ de rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid can smra bar brtsams te/ lha mo shAkya rnams
96b1('dul ba): kyi gzhon nu grangs ri'i ngos dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ste/ de bram ze mtshan ma gam dang / ltas mkhan rnams
96b2('dul ba): kyis/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur te/ 
96b3('dul ba): de'i rin po che sna bdun 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim
96b4('dul ba): bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che'o// del bu dpa' brtul phod pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang / ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/ stong yang
96b5('dul ba): tshang bar 'gyur zhing / de brgya mtsho la thugs pa'i sa chen po ma lus pa gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis mnga' ba med la/ chos
96b6('dul ba): dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas/ legs par phab te gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te skra dang kha spu breg te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
96b7('dul ba): bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/ de lta bu ni sangs
96b8('dul ba): rgyas zhes bgyi ba lags so// mu tig can gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag yul du 'dong ba de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mo bka' bzhin 'tshal/ sbran par
97a1('dul ba): bgyi'o// ji tsam na de rnams yul du 'dong pa'i dus la bab nas/ de rnams kyis mu tig can la sbran pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la yi ge gsol pa/ lha dang lha min
97a2('dul ba): mi yis phyag bgyis pa/ skye dang snyun dang bsnyengs las nges byung zhing // gtso bo grag pa rgya chen rab grags pa// drang srong bdud rtsi'i cha las thugs rjes gnong // zhes gsol to// de nas yi ge de tshong
97a3('dul ba): pa de rnams kyi khyer nas/ rims kyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
97a4('dul ba): bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mnyan yod kyi tshong pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
97a5('dul ba): sing ga la'i gling na/ sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo des mchid yi ge gsol pa 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis// mu tig can 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas nyid kyis blangs te/ 
97a6('dul ba): blugs so// blags nas bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe khyed cag slar 'dong bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ nga'i snyan du gsol cig btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshong pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
97a7('dul ba): kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo // de nas zong bsgyur te bsgyur ba'i zong thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
97a8('dul ba): mchi na/ bdag cag gis mu tig can la ji skad bgyi/ bka' stsal par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu legs par byi dor byas pa'i ras dang / ri mo mkhan
97b1('dul ba): ngag khug cig/ de rnams kyis ras dang ri mo mkhan dag bkug nas phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan bris shig/ ri mo
97b2('dul ba): mkhan rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar brtsams pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa yin pas/ ri mo mkhan rnams kyis brtsa
97b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis sku'i gzugs brnyan bri bar ma nus na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras ston cig dang 'od gtang ngo // de rnams kyis ras bstan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
97b4('dul ba): 'od gtang ba la ri mo mkhan rnams kyis tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rgyas par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi 'og tu gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang
97b5('dul ba): bslabs pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po lugs dang mthun kha dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa dang / 'phags pa'i
97b6('dul ba): lam yan lag brgyad pa bris so// gong du ni tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po// brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyimal glang chen bzhin// 
97b7('dul ba): 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas// chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba// skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par gyur zhes bris nas// 
97b8('dul ba): sing ga la'i rgyal po la bka' yig spring / ras la ri mo bris pa/ ngas mu tig can la skyes su bskur ba yin gyis/ khyod kyis des phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar sing ga la'i gling na gnas pa'i skye
98a1('dul ba): po'i tshogs bsdus la bkur bsti chen pos ras 'di khrom shig/ tshong pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ gal te mu tig can 'di ci yin zhes 'drin/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
98a2('dul ba): de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te 'og ma 'di ci yin zhes 'drin/ 'di dag ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs dang 'thun
98a3('dul ba): kha dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa dang / ldog pa'o// 'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no// zhes brjod pa
98a4('dul ba): bya'o// gal te gong ma 'di ci yin zhes 'drin spro bar bya ba da yin te gang zhig skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i dgazhi rnams blangs te/ lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs
98a5('dul ba): dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di la rtog ci nga brtson 'grus rtsoms pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i 'pha/ gas pa'i lam thob nas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol/ 
98a6('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod par bya'o// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshang pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas
98a7('dul ba): dge mtshan dang bkra shis dang / bde legs su gyur pa dag pas te/ zong khyer nas sing ga la'i gling du song ste/ rim gyis sing ga la'i gling du phyin nas/ lam gyis dub pa ngal sos te/ 
98a8('dul ba): rgyal po'i drung du song nas/ rkang pa gnyis la btugs te yi ge byin no// rgyal pos yi ge blangs te klags nas grong khyer de rdo ba dang gseg ma dang / gyo mo gsal nas/ tsan dan gyis chus/ 
98b1('dul ba): chag chag btab/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng / dar gyis chun 'chang mang po btags/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bzhag/ me tog sna tshogs bkram ste/ sing ga la'i gling na gan+da
98b2('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsags nas/ de nas bkur bsti chen po byas te/ grong khyer gyi dbus su rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams te/ ras phye ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs
98b3('dul ba): chen pos/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsang bstod de smras so// de nas rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig can dad pa drag pos gtad pa'i snying gis ba spu
98b4('dul ba): zing zhes byed cing mig mchi mas gang bas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ tshong pa rnams la dris pa/ shes ldan dag 'di ci yin/ de rnams kyi smra bar brtsams pa/ 'di ni
98b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i gzugs brnyan lags so// 'og ma 'di dag ci yin// 'di ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro kha dang / bslab pa'i bzhi lnga rnams dang / lugs dang 'thun
98b6('dul ba): ba dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par byung ba 'gro bar 'jug pa dang ldog pa'o// 'di ni bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags so// 
98b7('dul ba): gong ma 'di ci yin spro bar bgyi ba lags te/ gang zhig skyabs su song nas/ bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs te/ lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i rten cing 'brel par
98b8('dul ba): 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa 'di la rtog cing brtson 'grus brtsom pa de bdud rtsi rtogs pa'i lam thob nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur pa lags so// de nas mu
99a1('dul ba): tig can gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ lugs dang 'thun pa dang lug dang mi mthun pa bsam par brtsams te/ ji srid lan gsum
99a2('dul ba): ma zlas pa de'i bar du des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas tshigs
99a3('dul ba): su bcad pas smras pa/ ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs pas// gang la 'di 'dra'i gsol mnga' ba// sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo// ring na bzhugs
99a4('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// lta ba'i ri bo drungs phyung ste/ lta ba'i zug rngu sel mdzad pa// sman mkhas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras nas/ tshong pa
99a5('dul ba): rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag khyed cag nam 'dong ba de'i tshe kho mo la sbron cig/ de nas tshong ba rnams kyis zong rnams bsgyur te/ bsgyur ba'i zong rnams
99a6('dul ba): khyer nas mu tig can gyi drung du song ste/ lha mo bdag cag ni mchi na/ bdag gis ci zhig bgyi ba/ bka' stsal par gsol/ des smras pa/ kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
99a7('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ spyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba dang sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba la reg par
99a8('dul ba): gnas sam/ zhes zhus la/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bgyi ba gang lags pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad de/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan
99b1('dul ba): 'das la brten nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams las ni rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams su ni bzhag/ 'khor ba las ni brkyang bsrings/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni
99b2('dul ba): bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba
99b3('dul ba): ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon gsum du bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang / dge slong
99b4('dul ba): gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/ dge bsnyen du gzu dang du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid mtsho'i bar du srog dang ya dang bsngos te/ skyabs su mchi bar dad na mngon par dad lags
99b5('dul ba): so zhes gsol la/ mu tig bre gsum po 'di khyer cha cig/ ni sangs rgyas la/ cha gcig ni chos la/ cha gcig ni dge 'dun la phul cig/ de nas tshong pa de rnams kyis zong dang / 
99b6('dul ba): skyes skur ba yang khyer te dong nas/ rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal bsos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste zhabs gnyis la btugs nas/ ji skad spring
99b7('dul ba): pa bzhin bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// btsun pa skyes su phul ba'i mu tig bre gsum po 'di lags te/ mu tig cha cig ni sangs rgyas la/ cha cig ni chos la/ 
99b8('dul ba): cha cig ni dge 'dun la phul lags so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa skyes 'di gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dag
100a1('dul ba): bo khyod kyis shA kya ming chen gyis mngag gzhugs bskyed ma zhes bya ba / ngalas chos mnyan nas song ba las/ lam kar 'drus mas bsad pa mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong las/ 
100a2('dul ba): so// des nga la sems dang pa bskyed de shi bas/ sing ga la'i rgyal po'i bu mo mu tig tsan zhes bya bar gyur te/ bden pa mthong nas/ des skyes bskur ba 'di yin no// 'di las sangs rgyas kyi
100a3('dul ba): skal pa gang yin pa des dri gtsang khang gi zhal zhal byos shig/ chos kyi gang yin pa de ni chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la'o// dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni dge 'dun gyis mnyam par bgos
100a4('dul ba): shig/ dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mu tig can gyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na
100a5('dul ba): bran mor gyur lags/ las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na rgyu/ po phyug po'i rigs su skyes shing bden pa mthong bar dgyi sa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge/ 
100a6('dul ba): slong dag mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi bza' bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas
100a7('dul ba): mu tig can 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin/ 
100a8('dul ba): par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams lo mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dag ba dang mi dge bdag byas shing / bsags pa dag ni zin pa
100b1('dul ba): phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ chud mi za 'ang tshogs dus dang // rnyed na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag
100b2('dul ba): tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba// bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la// skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ 'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa
100b3('dul ba): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang / mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ des sangs rgyas kyi
100b4('dul ba): mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i mi bzhin dadu/ bA ra na ser phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'ang nges pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 
100b5('dul ba): rgyal po kri kris de'i sku dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyis spra ngas te/ spungs nas bkur ste chen pos bsregs te/ me de 'o mos bsad nas sku gdung de rnams gser gyi bum
100b6('dul ba): bar blugs te/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bzhi las byung ba'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/ 'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa zhig brtsigs nas/ dus
100b7('dul ba): mchod chen po btsugs so// bA ra na sen tshong dpon phyug pa nor mang ba long spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis
100b8('dul ba): 'gran pa zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ 
101a1('dul ba): dga' dgur spyod par byed kyang de la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med nas/ de lag pa 'gram pa la btang nas/ bdag gi khyim du nor phal po che bsags kyang bdag
101a2('dul ba): la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med pas/ bdag shi nas bdog pa thams cad bu med do zhes byas te/ rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa de
101a3('dul ba): la dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / grogs po dang mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mnyes par byos shig dang / khyod la bu yod par 'gyur ro// de bu med
101a4('dul ba): de bu mngon par 'dod pas/ zhi ba dang / chu lha dang / lus dang na dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa gzha dan yang lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa
101a5('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang / nags tshal gyi lha dang / bzhi mdo'i lha dang / sum mdo'i lha dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang / chos
101a6('dul ba): 'thun pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha la yang gsol ba 'debs so// 'di ltar gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyas bu pho dang / bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jig rten na de skad du grags pa
101a7('dul ba): yod de/ de yang de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar 'gyur na ni re re la yang dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang gnas gsum mngon tu gyur/ 
101a8('dul ba): pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur te gnas gsum gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing / lhan cig 'dus pa dang / ma mngal rung bar gyur cing / zla mtshan dang ldan
101b1('dul ba): ba dang / dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas de gsum mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ba yin na des bu yod pa'i las ma byas pas/ des na de la bu pho dang bu mo med do// 
101b2('dul ba): ci tsam na de nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa dang sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang / de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur to// de nas de'i chung mas
101b3('dul ba): bsams pa/ bdag gi khyim na nor phal po che bsags pa ni bdag la bu pho yang med bu mo yang med la bdag gi khyim thab 'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur gyis/ da ni gal te 'jig rten pha rol gyi
101b4('dul ba): lam rgyags ma blangs na/ nor zas 'di thams cad bdag dal bu med do zhes byas nas/ rgyal pos dbang byas par 'gyur ro snyam na/ de'i mu tig gi do shal brgya stong ri ba
101b5('dul ba): mgul na thogs pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten de la dri dang byug pas byug/ sa nas mchod pa byas te btags nas/ dad pa drag
101b6('dul ba): pos drung du gtugs te/ smon lam btab pa sbyin pa'i chos yongs su btang ba dang / sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug po'i rigs su skye zhing yon tan 'di lta bu yang thob
101b7('dul ba): cing / ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed kyi/ mi mnyes par ma gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshong dpon gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni mu tig can
101b8('dul ba): 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ phyug pa'i rig
102a1('dul ba): su skyes shing bcas pa na mu tig gi char bab po// nga'i bstan pa la yang dad pa skyes pas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom na/ 
102a2('dul ba): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// gzhan yang tshong dpon nong mang du bsags pa de'i chung mar gyur pa na/ de na 'dis dbang phyug gi grags pas rgyags nas/ spyod
102a3('dul ba): yul du gnas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la tshig tu bran mo'i bu zhes kun tu smras pa/ de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs mang por bran mor gyur to// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig
102a4('dul ba): tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag dpa yin zhing / gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dka/ dar la/ 'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no// de bas na dge
102a5('dul ba): slong dag gcig tu gnag pa'i las rnams dang / 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la gcig tu dkar ba'i las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par
102a6('dul ba): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi cha gang kho yin pa de ni/ chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de la mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan
102a7('dul ba): 'das kyi mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas/ rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo // 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nang
102a8('dul ba): gi mdzod srung zhing kho bo cag 'dul ba mtha' dag 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas/ rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo // ma mo 'dzin pa rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag ni mdo
102b1('dul ba): sde dang / 'dul ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang / spyi'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pas/ kho bo cag chos 'dzin pa yin pas rnyed pa 'di ni kho bo cag dbang ngo zhes/ de na mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang / 
102b2('dul ba): ma mo 'dzin pa rnams 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang thab mo dang 'gyed pa byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma 'thab shig/ 'chang
102b3('dul ba): ma 'dru shig/ 'thab mo ma byed cig/ ma 'gyed cig/ dge slong dag bzhi po 'di dag ni rtsod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsong pa dang / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i cod
102b4('dul ba): pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa'o// 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi 'phrod par smra ba/ mi mthun pa kun tu mi dga' ba/ rgyud
102b5('dul ba): gcig tu ma gyur pa gang yin pa de las brten te 'thab pa/ dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// gdams ngag
102b6('dul ba): med pa'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag bzhag pa gang yin pa de las brten nas 'thab pa dang mchong 'dru ba dang / 'thab
102b7('dul ba): 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// ltung ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ ltung ba lnga ni ltung ba'i phung po lnga zhes bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / 
102b8('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang so sor gshegs par bya ba dang / nyes byas gang yin pa de las brten nas/ 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'dru dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di
103a1('dul ba): ni ltung ba'i rtsong pa zhes bya'o// bya ba'i rtsod pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten
103a2('dul ba): nas/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba'i rtsod pa zhes bya'o// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / 'gyeng pa'i rtsod
103a3('dul ba): pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/ 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug dang / 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu pozhi ste/ 'gyed po'i rtsa ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di ni la la khro ba yin zhing khon du 'dzin pa yin te khro
103a4('dul ba): zhing khon tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur debasti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do// ston pa la bkur bsti ma byas/ bla mar ma byas// 
103a5('dul ba): ri mor ma byas/ mchod par ma byas pas chos mi mthong ngo // / chos ma mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul la mi blta'o// dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta na/ dge 'dun la 'di lta bu'i
103a6('dul ba): 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa 'byin par byed do// 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa ma
103a7('dul ba): yin pa dang / skye bo mang po la gnod pa dang / skye bo mang po la sdug bsngal po dang / lha dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang / gnod pa dang sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no// dge sbyong dag gal te/ 
103a8('dul ba): khyod kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi 'am/ phyi rol gyi yang rung ma spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig 'thun zhing / kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med
103b1('dul ba): pas 'dun pa drag pa dang brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / ma zlog pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ji tsam 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spangs kyi bar du brtson
103b2('dul ba): bar bya'o// de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang spong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung / phyi'i yang rung / lags par spangs par
103b3('dul ba): yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig 'thun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas/ 'dun pa drag po dang brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi zlog
103b4('dul ba): pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ci tsam rtsod pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyir kyang mi 'byung bar brtson par bya ste/ dade ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs
103b5('dul ba): par gsal bas/ phyis skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dul ba gzhi// / bam po don brgyad pa// khro zhing khong tu 'dzin pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'chab cing
103b6('dul ba): 'tshig pa dang / phrag dog byed cing ser sna can dang / g.yo byed cing sgyu can dang / ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa yang de dang 'dra'o// gzhan yang 'di na la la rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yin
103b7('dul ba): zhing 'chab pa'i 'dzin pa dang / smras pa la dang na then byed pa yin te/ rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa 'chal ba 'dzin pa/ smras pa la dang na then byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ ston pa la bkur
103b8('dul ba): bsti mi byed/ bla mar mi byed/ ri mor mi byed/ mchod par mi byed do// de ston pa la bkur bsti ma byas/ bla mar ma byas/ ri mor ma byas/ mchod par ma byas par chos mi mthong ngo // 
104a1('dul ba): chos mi mthong bas dge sbyong gi tshul la mi lta'o// dge sbyong gi tshul la mi ltan/ dge 'dun la de lta bu'i 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang 'gyed pa
104a2('dul ba): 'byin par byed do// 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa ni/ skye bo mang po la phan pa ma yin pa dang / skye bo mang po la gnod pa dang / skye bo mang po la sdug
104a3('dul ba): bsngal ba dang / lha dang mi rnams la mi phan pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal bar byed pa yin no// dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu nang gi yang rung phyi'i 'ang rung ma
104a4('dul ba): spangs par yang dag par mthong na/ de la khyed cag lhan cig 'thun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med dpas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa
104a5('dul ba): dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi zlogs pa'i dran pa dang / shes bzhin gyis ji lta ba 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba byung ba de nyid spong ba'i bar du brtson par bya ste/ de ltar na khyod kyis
104a6('dul ba): 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de spong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag gal te khyed kyis bgyed pa'i rtsa ba de lta bu/ nang gi yang rung / phyi'i 'ang rung lags par spangs par yang dag par mthong na de la
104a7('dul ba): khyed cag lhan cig 'thun zhing kun tu dga' ba dang / 'gyed pa med pas 'dun pa drag po dang / brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / spro ba dang / sgrim pa dang / mi zlogs pa'i dran pa dang / 
104a8('dul ba): shes bzhin gyis ci nas kyang 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba spangs pa de nyid phyis kyang mi 'byung bar brtson par bya ste/ de ltar na khyed kyis 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba de yang dag par legs par gsal bas/ phyis
104b1('dul ba): skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni 'gyed pa'i rtsa ba drug ces bya'o// 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu gzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ chos so zhe'am chos ma yin no zhe'am 'dul ba'o zhes 'am 'dul ba
104b2('dul ba): ma yin no zhe'am/ ltung ba'o zhe'am/ ltung ba ma yin pa'o zhe 'am/ lci ba'am yang ba 'am/ lhag ma dang bcas pa 'am/ lhag ma med pa 'am/ bshags par bya ba 'am/ bsdam par bya ba
104b3('dul ba): 'am/ nyes par bshad par gtogs pa 'am/ legs par bshad par gtogs pa ste/ 'di dag ni 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi bcu bzhi zhes bya'o// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni
104b4('dul ba): de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yi dan no// dge slong dag gdams ngag med po'i rtsod pa ni ci zhag gi rtsa bo can yin zhing // gdams ngag med pa'i
104b5('dul ba): rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/ dge 'dun gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag bzhag pa gang yin pa de la brten nas/ 'thab pa
104b6('dul ba): dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang 'gyed pa gang yin pa ste/ dge slong dag gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin// 
104b7('dul ba): dge slong dag ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/ ltung ba'i rigs lnga ni ltung ba'i rigs dang ltung ba'i phung po zhes bya ste/ lnga gang
104b8('dul ba): zhe na/ phas pham pa dang / dge 'dun lhag ma dang / ltung byed dang / so sor bshags par bya ba dang / nyes byas so// gzhan yang lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin
105a1('dul ba): ba yang yod/ ngag gi yin gyi lus kyi ma yin sems kyi ma yin pa'ang yod// lus kyi ngang sems kyi yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin pa yang yod/ lus dang ngag dang sems kyi
105a2('dul ba): yin pa yang yod do// lus kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong khyim pa 'am/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i phyir ma byung bar khyim pa 'am/ 
105a3('dul ba): bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i phyir byung ngo snyam nas/ nyal bar byed pa na de gnyid log pa dang / bud med nyal ba 'am/ gnyid log nas khri stan chen po'i steng du bzhag pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi ltung ba
105a4('dul ba): yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin sems kyi ma yin no// ngag gi ltung dab yin gyi lus kyi ma yin/ sems kyi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong dag bud med la chos tshig lnga
105a5('dul ba): 'chad pa las ched du ma bsams par tshig drug tu thal ba 'am/ tshig drug 'chad pa na tshig bdun thal ba ste/ 'di ni ngag gi ltung ba yin gyi/ lus kyi ma yin sems kyi
105a6('dul ba): ma yin no// lus dang sems kyi ltung ba yin gyi/ ngag gi ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis ched du bsams te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phral nas/ 
105a7('dul ba): 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srog chags srog dang dpral bar bya ste/ de ltar bsad pa ni de legs par bsad pa yin no zhes mi smra zhing / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod/ 
105a8('dul ba): pas log par g.yem pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba 'thung la/ 'di skad ces ji ltar bdog gis 'thungs pa de bzhin du myos par 'gyur ba btung bar bya ste/ de ltar 'thungs pa ni legs par
105b1('dul ba): 'thungs pa yin no zhes mi smra ba ste/ 'di ni lus dang sems kyi ltung ba yin gyi ngag gi ma yin no// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi ltung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gis ched du bsams te/ dud 'gro
105b2('dul ba): skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags srog dang phral la/ 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis bsad pa de bzhin du srog chags srog dang da bral bar bya ste/ de ltar bsad pa ni legs par bsad pa yin no
105b3('dul ba): zhes smra zhing / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang 'thung la/ 'di skad ces ji ltar bdag gis 'thungs pa de bzhin myos par 'gyur ba btung
105b4('dul ba): bar bya ste/ de ltar myos par 'gyur ba 'thungs pa ni/ legs dpar 'thungs pa yin no zhes smras pa ste/ 'di ni lus dang / ngag dang sems kyi ltung ba yin te/ dge slong dag ltung ba'i
105b5('dul ba): rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni de yin no// dge slong dag bya ba'i rtsod pa ni ci zhig gi rtsa ba can yin zhing / bya ba'i rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ni ci yin zhe na/ dge
105b6('dul ba): 'dun gyi bya ba gang yin pa gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang / bzhi'i las gang yin pa ste/ dge slong dag bya ba'i rtsod pa ni de'i rtsa ba can yin zhing / bya ba'i rtsod pa'i
105b7('dul ba): rtsa ba ni de yin no// dge slong dag 'gyed pa'i rtsod pa ni dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub
105b8('dul ba): cing don sems la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang / mchong 'dru ba/ 
106a1('dul ba): dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyeng pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no// mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems la/ dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing dge ba ma
106a2('dul ba): sems pa'i sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang 'gyed pa gang yin pa de ni mi dge ba
106a3('dul ba): yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / don sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/ 
106a4('dul ba): dge ba don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa ya dang ma yin zhing / dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i sna tshogs su smra ba/ 
106a5('dul ba): 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi 'thun par smra ba gang yin pa de la brten nas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma
106a6('dul ba): bstan pa yin no// gdams ngag med pa'i rtsod pa ni/ dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don
106a7('dul ba): sgrub cing don sems la/ dge ba'i don sgrub cing dge ba sems pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab
106a8('dul ba): pa dang / 'chang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no// mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing don mi sems la/ dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing / 
106b1('dul ba): dge ba mi sems pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed
106b2('dul ba): pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / don sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin// 
106b3('dul ba): ba sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba sems
106b4('dul ba): pa yang ma yin pa'i gdams ngag mi len pa dang / gdams ngag mi sbyin pa dang / gdams ngag 'jog pa gang yin/ bde las brten te/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 
106b5('dul ba): 'thab mo dang 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no// ltung ba'i rtsod pa ni/ mi dge ba zhes brjod/ ra bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ mi dge
106b6('dul ba): ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang / dge 'dun gyis khrims su bcas pa las/ ched du bsams te 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no// lung du ma bstan pa
106b7('dul ba): gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyis bslab pa bcas pa dang / dge 'dun gyis khrims su bcas pa las ched du ma bsams par 'das pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no// bya ba'i
106b8('dul ba): rtsod pa ni/ dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ mi dge ba zhes brjod par bya/ lung du ma bstan pa zhes brjod par bya ste/ dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub cing don sems la/ dge ba'i don
107a1('dul ba): sgrub cing / dge ba sems pa'i gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de las brten te/ 'thab pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba
107a2('dul ba): dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni dge ba yin no// mi dge ba gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don mi sgrub cing mi sems la/ dge ba'i don mi sgrub cing / dge ba mi sems pa'i gsol ba
107a3('dul ba): dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gang yin pa de la brten te/ 'thab pa dang / mching 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni mi dge ba yin no// lung
107a4('dul ba): du ma bstan pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ don mi yin pa sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / don sems pa yang ma yin/ don ma yin pa sems pa yang ma
107a5('dul ba): yin la/ dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba'i don sgrub pa yang ma yin zhing / dge ba sems pa yang ma yin/ mi dge ba sems pa yang ma yin pa'i 'thab pa
107a6('dul ba): dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni lung du ma bstan pa yin no// 'gyed pa gang yin pa de rtsod pa lags la/ rtsod pa gang lags pa de 'gyed pa lags sam// 
107a7('dul ba): bka' stsal bar/ 'gyed pa yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa yang yod/ rtsod pa yin la 'gyed pa ma yin pa yang yod/ 'gyed pa yang yin/ rtsod pa yang yin pa yang yod/ 'gyed pa yang ma yin rtsod
107a8('dul ba): pa yang ma yin pa yang yod do// re shig 'gyed pa yin la rtsod pa ma yin pa ni/ dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/ 'gal bar smra ba/ rigs mi mthun par smra ba gang yin pa'o// rtsod pa yin la
107b1('dul ba): 'gyed pa ma yin pa ni rtsod pa gsum po// gang bas ngag med pa'i rtsod pa dang / bya ba'i rtsod pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'o// rtsod pa yang yin la 'gyed pa yang yin pa ni/ dge 'dun sna tshogs su smra ba/
