281a3('dul ba): zas sbyin khrid nas gtsug lags khang du zhugs te/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas
281a4('dul ba): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug rapa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon me da zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
281a5('dul ba): bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par ga/ zeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus chos
281a6('dul ba): kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / mtho ris kyi gtam dang / 'dod pa rnams la mnog chung ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / kun nas
281a7('dul ba): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan yon gyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to// gang gi tshe bcom
281a8('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i sems dang / dge ba'i sems dang / mgu ba'i sems dang / sgrib po dang bral ba'i sems dang / skal ba dang ldan pa'i yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa kun
281b1('dul ba): par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung
281b2('dul ba): ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam rgyas par rab tu bstan to// dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin btub pa de bzhin du khyim bdag
281b3('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtog so// khyim bdag mgon// 
281b4('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gtong slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tsom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring
281b5('dul ba): mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang / ston pas pa/ stan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom
281b6('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni 'phag so// mngon par 'phag so// bdag po ldan 'das dang / chos dang
281b7('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tshe'i bar du srog dang bsngos te skyabasu mchi bar mngon par dad lag so// de nas
281b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod kyi ming ci/ btsun pa bdag gi ming bzang sbyin lags mod kyi/ bdag mgon ma
282a1('dul ba): mchis pa rnamal 'tshal sa stsol pas/ des na bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar skye bos 'tshal to// khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/ btsun pa yul pa
282a2('dul ba): cin zhes bgyi ba na ko sa la rnams kyi grong khyer mnyan yod ces bgyi ba mchis te/ de na bdag mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs shig dang / bcom ldan 'das dge slong
282a3('dul ba): gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims ca dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur
282a4('dul ba): bgyi lag so// khyim bdag mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ btsun pa ma mchis lag so// khyim bdag gang na gtsu gau lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba
282a5('dul ba): dang / gnas par sems so// bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig dang / bdag gis ci nas kyang mnyan yod du dge slong rnams mchis pa dang / gzhan du mchi ba dang / mchi bar
282a6('dul ba): sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsigs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la cang mo gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
282a7('dul ba): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas rgyal po'i
282a8('dul ba): khab tu bya ba bsgrub pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad byas shing bsgrub nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyog
282b1('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong gcig
282b2('dul ba): stsal du gsol/ de dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang brtsigs lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ dge slong su zhig khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'kho
282b3('dul ba): dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs 'dul bar 'gyur snyam na/ dge slong shA ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas/ de nas bcom 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
282b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas spyi dan 'khor dang bcas pa dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs la soms shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
282b5('dul ba): cang mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan to// de na/ sa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab so gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
282b6('dul ba): kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/ snga dro sham thabs bgos// lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la
282b7('dul ba): zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te/ gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa mkhosu phab nas/ de lhung bzed dang / chos gos blangs
282b8('dul ba): te/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing song ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam brgyags mang po khyer nas/ nub mo nub mo zhing mnyan yod du song ste byin nas/ de mnyan yod du ma zhus/ 
283a1('dul ba): pa nyid du kun dgar banas kun dga' ba dang / bskyed mos tshal nas bskyed mos chal dang / nags chal nas nags chal du 'chags nas 'chags sar dpyod cing 'dis
283a2('dul ba): ces smras so// mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la/ hatsang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par lang long nyung shing ku bo nyung ba dang / mtshan mo bcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dong / sha sga
283a3('dul ba): dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs gang na yod pa der/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsigs na/ sa phyogs de gang na yod snyam pa
283a4('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed/ kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring la ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin por yang lang long nyung zhing ku
283a5('dul ba): nyung ba dang / mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sgra nga bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du
283a6('dul ba): sems te/ 'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ de rang gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du/ gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gzhan
283a7('dul ba): nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba bdag la stsol cig/ der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lag so// des smras pa/ khyim bdag de
283a8('dul ba): ni nga'i kun dga' ra ba ni ma yin te/ bskyed mos tshol yin mod kyi/ de nga'i yin no// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras
283b1('dul ba): gzhon nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba stsol cig/ bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang 'phrig lag so// khyim bdag kun dga' ra bde gser bye ba bshibs kyang mi gtong/ 
283b2('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi// bam po dgu bcu pa// yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin thang bkum lags kyis/ 
283b3('dul ba): dbyig dang gser ba zhes shig/ kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gi lag so// rim thong sus bcang / khyod kyis rim thang bkum mod/ de gnyis rin thang bcang ngo // rin thang ma bcang de zhes brtsod par
283b4('dul ba): gyur nas/ zhal che gcod pa'i mi gang na ba der dong ba dang / dbar skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du semangs te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan
283b5('dul ba): 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsag par brtson gyis/ de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas de nas zhal che gtsang / pa'i mor bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ dgos pa'i phyir
283b6('dul ba): 'dus so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i drung du song nas de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal che gcod
283b7('dul ba): pa sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams la don nga rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba ni rin thang bcad zin gyis gser long shig/ kun dga'o ra ba ni khyim bdag
283b8('dul ba): gi yin no// de cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta dang / rgya dang gze ba dang / rnga mo dang / glang dang / bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas/ 
284a1('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad gshib par brtsams pa dang / sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug go// de nas khyim bdag mgon med
284a2('dul ba): zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ngu yang ma yin/ 
284a3('dul ba): ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam pa dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni gdon mi za bar ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phu
284a4('dul ba): po chen po 'di snyed du ngas su btang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag gal te khyod 'gyed pa
284a5('dul ba): skyes na gser slar longs shig/ kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid/ kye yin no// gzhon nu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te/ 'on kyang don 'di sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar
284a6('dul ba): 'dug pa ni/ bdag gi ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkab nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha tsang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam mo// 
284a7('dul ba): de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing / chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la ngad ltar
284a8('dul ba): khyim bdag 'od kun dga' ra ba'i tshong du nor gyi phung po 'di stong yongasu btong ngo snyam du bsams nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag ma bkram
284b1('dul ba): pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la sbyin cig/ der kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgron med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed lam bkram pa'i sa phyogs
284b2('dul ba): byin nas/ der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig tu bcug go// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang bcig
284b3('dul ba): brtsams pa dang / mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas slong ba'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags po dang / smras pa khyim bdag khyod
284b4('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma brtsig shi ga/ ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer bgos deng / dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i ni rgyal po'i khab yin no// kho bo cag
284b5('dul ba): gi ni mnyan yod yin no// des smras pa/ khyed cag gis gro nga khyer rnams bgos kyi/ bdag gi nor ma bgos pas gang la mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyi phu lo brtsig go// 
284b6('dul ba): de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong pa dang / der yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang / mu stegs spyi rdol can mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag dga'
284b7('dul ba): dgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog gcig 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs shig/ des smras pa
284b8('dul ba): rung gis re shog 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyi
285a1('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras// 
285a2('dul ba): btsun pa shA DI'i bu mu snyigs can rnams 'di skad ces khyim bdag khyod dga' dgur byed du mi gzhugs te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas gal te de'i shags kyis kha
285a3('dul ba): cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs shig ces mchi na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zad yod dam/ 
285a4('dul ba): 'on te med ces bsams pa las yod par mthong ngo // su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na bdag kho na la'o// // yang bsams pa ji 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las
285a5('dul ba): tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan yang tshe ga gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las yod par mthong / ngo // dus ji srid kyi tshogs par 'gyur snyam na/ zhag bdun lon
285a6('dul ba): nas so// bsams nas smras pa/ khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon mamed zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu bskyes nas/ mu stegs
285a7('dul ba): can rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras// shes ldan dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu na re de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o// 
285a8('dul ba): zhes zer ro// de rnams kyis bsams pa/ 'di la rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/ yang na ni de 'bros 'dod do// yang na ni de phyogs tshol lo// de ma yin na dus der gdab ci dgos/ bdag cag
285b1('dul ba): phyogs bcalo zhes de rnams phyogs btsal bar 'artsams te/ de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang / kun tu rgyu mig dmar mthong nas/ de la de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa
285b2('dul ba): mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gis bzang ba'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol gyis/ khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig/ dus ji tsam zhig
285b3('dul ba): na/ 'di nas zhag bdun gyi bar ro// rung gis de bzhin du bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig/ mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang / sems khral skyes nas/ nyin
285b4('dul ba): re zhing phyogs tshol ba dang / nyi ma 'grang bar byed do// ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du
285b5('dul ba): bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bu'i ched du yang seng ge'i/ khri bsham so// yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu steg sa can rnams dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
285b6('dul ba): dang / de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mcher skyes/ kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
285b7('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar te/ rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas gdul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas te/ 'dzum pa sngon du btang nas spongad
285b8('dul ba): lam zhi bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug go// 'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng ba'i tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci re shig
286a1('dul ba): byed dam/ 'on te 'jig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis byas/ khyod kyis shig cig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis byas na
286a2('dul ba): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas kyang 'jig par mi nus na/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smra so// khyod kyis byos shig/ 
286a3('dul ba): ngas gzhig go// de mig 'phrul bya ba yin pas/ des shing sa ha ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang char drag po phab ste/ des de rtsa ba nas
286a4('dul ba): phyung nas phan tshun du rnam par gautor te/ rnal 'byor pa rnam das kyi yul du yang ma gyur to// de nas des pad+ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus glang po che
286a5('dul ba): bzang po zhig sprul nas/ des kun tu rnal nas ming gi lhag ma tsam zhig bzhag go// des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus na mkha' lding zhig
286a6('dul ba): sprul te/ des de blang so// des ro langs shig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa btab pa las nyes par dpyad pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid la bsod par byed pas des de nyid
286a7('dul ba): bsnyags pa dang / de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs shing spu zing zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu skyabasu mchi lags kyis/ yongasu bskyab
286a8('dul ba): tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang / ro langs de zhi bar gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshang dod dad pa skyes nas/ smras pa/ 'phagra/ 
286b1('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa
286b2('dul ba): spyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas gdams ngag byin te/ des brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cangs
286b3('dul ba): nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sam
286b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang
286b5('dul ba): rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis ma chod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya
286b6('dul ba): bar gyur to// de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrang nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te/ smras pa 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni/ smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po
286b7('dul ba): tshar bcad do snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin
286b8('dul ba): shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so so yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas so// de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ 
287a1('dul ba): kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ 
287a2('dul ba): kha cig gis ni skyabasu 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs/ kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / kha
287a3('dul ba): cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// 'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la
287a4('dul ba): gzhol ba chos la 'bab pa/ dge 'dun la bab pa la bko ngo // mu stegs can rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag gis 'di shags kyis char bcad par mi nus kyis thabs
287a5('dul ba): shig bsham par byas la/ de nas glags rnyed nas/ 'di bsgrags te bsad par bya'o snyam nas/ thams cad 'dra/ sa te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du dong ste
287a6('dul ba): smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad ni bcad pas/ de bos snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o// kho bo cag
287a7('dul ba): 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo // khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ re shig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag go zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
287a8('dul ba): bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'odadi skad ces smras so// 'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchid nas/ khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad
287b1('dul ba): bcad pas na snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o// kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo zhes mchi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
287b2('dul ba): ri'i bu bsam pa la zhugs te/ ci 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med snyam na des yod par mthong ngo // su zhig la rag lus snyam na/ bdag kho na la'o snyam na/ nges
287b3('dul ba): bsams te smras pa/ khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ de rnams gtsug lag khang der glu mi'i las byed par brtsams pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcags/ 
287b4('dul ba): thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/ des de rnams las byed du bzhugs par brtsam so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dbus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas/ de dang nye ba'i
287b5('dul ba): shing drung zhig na/ 'chags cing 'dug pa de/ de rnams kyis mthong nas/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ dben pa na 'dug pas/ 'di bsad pa'i dus ni 'di yino// snyam
287b6('dul ba): nas de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong ste/ bskor nas 'dug go// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di rnams bsam pa ci 'dra bas bdag gi drung du 'ongs snyam na/ ci tsam na bsad
287b7('dul ba): pa'i sems kyis yin par shes nas/ des lhag thogs sprul pa de spad nas/ des de rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu
287b8('dul ba): yongasu bskyab tu gsol/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa re shig song la ngal sor chug cig/ de rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'di ni 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni 'di
288a1('dul ba): bsad par bsams na/ 'di ni bdag cag la byams par sems so snyam du rig nas/ dang par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyis bsams pa
288a2('dul ba): dang dpag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te de thos nas de rnams kyi 'jigs
288a3('dul ba): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden po mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa bdag cag
288a4('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po ga/ nang na/ bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs
288a5('dul ba): par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ de/ rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams ngag byin te/ de rnams kyis brtson pa dang / 'bad
288a6('dul ba): pa dang / brtsal bar byas pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / lhung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / 
288a7('dul ba): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par gyur nas/ khams gsum gyi
288a8('dul ba): 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbub
288b1('dul ba): dral zhing / rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang
288b2('dul ba): pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung / mtha'
288b3('dul ba): gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsam so// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i
288b4('dul ba): bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa da'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad nas/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis
288b5('dul ba): 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim bdag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi
288b6('dul ba): mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ri su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrang de
288b7('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lta na de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang thig skud de bzung ba dang / 
288b8('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/ dad pa de'i 'jug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po che sna bzhi
289a1('dul ba): lus byas par gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar bya'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel
289a2('dul ba): rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu cig tu bcug ste/ de gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu brligs nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis
289a3('dul ba): rgyas par byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'ongs gshegs na/ 
289a4('dul ba): shul so ji tsam du byon par 'gyur/ khyim bdag dperan 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tsam mo// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag 'khor
289a5('dul ba): lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni ny+tsi gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i la/ ma du 'gre'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi/ sa gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi ga sh+ye
289a6('dul ba): dgongs brtsigs nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug/ sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug/ dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan/ tsan+dan gyi chus
289a7('dul ba): chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor dag nye bar bkod/ rta babs dog byed du bcug dus kyi dang thun chod kyi sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go// de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la
289a8('dul ba): bsgo ba/ kye nang rje tshur spyon/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la son pa dang kho bo'i tshig gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam pa
289b1('dul ba): bachung ngam/ 'tsho'am bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes nus la 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gsheg su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong/ 
289b2('dul ba): gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid do zhes kyang
289b3('dul ba): gsol cig/ jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to// de nas lam
289b4('dul ba): gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis da la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs
289b5('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas mi nges bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce/ sa gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs ga nyis la/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag
289b6('dul ba): 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa khyim bdag mgon med zas
289b7('dul ba): sbyin gyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegasu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la/ bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod
289b8('dul ba): snyoms dang gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas mi de bcom
290a1('dul ba): ldan 'das yang mi gsung bas gnang bar riganas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na pas gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan song ngo // de nas parjo/ 
290a2('dul ba): ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba ni 'khor ni ba/ grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba/ 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dag bcom pa/ 'khor
290a3('dul ba): dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba mdzes pa/ 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che'i mchog glang po che bra gu
290a4('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta b+hu/ se mche ba can gyi tshogs kyi/ des bskor ba lta bu/ drang ba'i rgyal po ngang ba'i tshe dgas kyis bskor ba lta bu/ na mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bsnye
290a5('dul ba): blta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khri ra lo bsgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla bar+m+ma skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bsko
290a6('dul ba): ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod
290a7('dul ba): sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag bzangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis/ 
290a8('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dreg pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu
290b1('dul ba): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas rgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od
290b2('dul ba): can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong
290b3('dul ba): gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / lha brgya stong phrag du mas zham 'bring byas nas/ gnyen
290b4('dul ba): yod kyi grong khyer du gsheg so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas mngon dpar 'du mdzad pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i thim pa la zhabs
290b5('dul ba): g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshes rnam pa drug tu g.yos par/ gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos// ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ 
290b6('dul ba): shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'// nub phyogs mthon sher phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma'// 
290b7('dul ba): dbus mtho na mtha' dma'i bar gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas to// snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// bar snang la yang lha'i rnga rdung zhing namakha'i dkyil
290b8('dul ba): na gnas pa'i lhas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsin+dan gyi phye ma dang / gu
291a1('dul ba): thus kyi phyem dang / tam la'i los dbyes dang / zhwa'i ba tog shAr ba rnams 'bor zhing gA'i gos rnams kyang 'khor mo// bcom ldan 'das thob bye du gshegs pa/ 
291a2('dul ba): 'di dag dang gzhan yang ngo mtshar de la bu dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dag pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to// dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to// mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to// 
291a3('dul ba): glang po che yang skad 'byin/ rta yang skad 'byin// khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to// khyim na yod pa'i rol mo tsho byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sa 'byin to// long ba rnams kyis ni mig gis
291a4('dul ba): mthong ngo // 'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos so// lkugs pa rnams kyis ni smra nus par gyur to// dbang po mching dab rnams ni dbang po rnams yongasu chung bar gyur to// 
291a5('dul ba): gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// dug 'thungs pa rnams ni dugazhi bar gyur to// phan tshun 'khon byung ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to// sbrum ma rnams ni
291a6('dul ba): bde bar bcas par gyur to// btson du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa thams cad las thar ro// nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to// de dag drang gzhon yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer
291a7('dul ba): du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur bsti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegaso// gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung
291a8('dul ba): la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso// de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen gyi skye bos yongasu bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun
291b1('dul ba): gleng bar brtsams pa las/ de 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur glang snyam pa
291b2('dul ba): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med do// 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'diraro 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag pa
291b3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengaso shig/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
291b4('dul ba): nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad/ rgyal byed kyi la brjod par mdzad pa na/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsam
291b5('dul ba): pa/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog ma ra smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'ang sa kyi thugs kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas/ 
291b6('dul ba): dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no// zhes der ming thog mar smos pa mdzad do// gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dor bdag
291b7('dul ba): gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas/ shin tu dga' bar gyur te dga' ba dang / mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go// 
291b8('dul ba): de bzhin du gnas brtan sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang / mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so zhes gdags pa byas// kos
292a1('dul ba): la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong go'u tra ma ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ gnyen yod du byon nas/ gnyen yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
292a2('dul ba): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ shes ldan go'u tam de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o zhes thos so// 
292a3('dul ba): thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas
292a4('dul ba): te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye go'u tam bdag gis shes ldan
292a5('dul ba): go'u ta ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid na/ la gyis 'tsho'o zhes thos lags na/ go'u ta ma gang dag pa
292a6('dul ba): skad ces lung ston pa de dag cig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs pa ma lags sam/ thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/ shes ldan go'u ta mas gsungs bzhin smra ba lags sam/ chos
292a7('dul ba): smra ba lags sam/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/ cig de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang 'thun par rtsod pa'i rje su rtsod pa mchis na/ smod pa'i chos kyi gnasu mi 'gyur
292a8('dul ba): lags sam/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden dang la skur pa 'debs pa ma yin thal par smra ba ma yin/ de ni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/ 
292b1('dul ba): chos smra ba yin// chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes rtsong pa 'ongs na smod pa'i chos kyi gnasu mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen
292b2('dul ba): bo de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// shes ldan go'u ta ma de skad gsung mod kyi/ shes ldan go'u ta ma la bdag
292b3('dul ba): yid mi ches lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kye go'u ta ma re shig rgan zhing rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu
292b4('dul ba): dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung bla na med pa yang
292b5('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyis mi mche lags na/ shes ldan go'u ta ma mkhrungs nas ring po ma lags pa/ gas
292b6('dul ba): du rab tu byung bas lha mos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po rgyal
292b7('dul ba): rigs gzhon nu khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil mnan par mi bya'o// rgyal po chen po sbrul gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu lo zil gyis gnan par mi bya'o// rgyal po
292b8('dul ba): chen po me chung ngu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ chung ngu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o rgyal po chen po dge slong gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o// rgyal
293a1('dul ba): po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong gzhon nur gyur kyang / de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas ni/ de
293a2('dul ba): bar gshegs kyis de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs// rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang // rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la// blo dang ldan pas de gzhon
293a3('dul ba): zhes/ khyad du mi gsad zil mi mnan// rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis// rgyal srid dag ni thob gyur nas// chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod// de bas de la shin tu gdung // de ltar rang gi/ 
293a4('dul ba): srog srung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni// de ni khyad du migs dad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// gal te grong dang ma dgon pa'ang rung // gang du sbrul ni mthong gyur na// blo
293a5('dul ba): ldan pas de gzhon zhes// de khyad mi gsang zil mi mnan// 'di ltar sbrul ni rgyu ba ni// rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la// glags rnyed nas ni gzhon nus kyang // skyes pa bud med du ma
293a6('dul ba): zin// de lngas rang gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas na// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// mang po sreg cing 'bar byed la// lam gnag sreg bya za ba'i me// blong
293a7('dul ba): ldan pas de chung zhes// khyad du mi gsang zil mi mnan// me ni chung ngur gyur pa yang // rkyen la chen por gyur pa yin// mes ni ring po mi thogs par// grong khyer dang ni grong khyer sreg/ de ltar rang gi
293a8('dul ba): srog srung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// lam nag sreg bya za ba'i mes// nags tshal bsregs pa gang yin de// zhag 'das nas ni
293b1('dul ba): 'ga' zhig tu// mngab ma rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi// dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la// brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa// de la bu che yod min pas// bgo skal spyod pa 'thob mi 'gyur// ta la'i mgo
293b2('dul ba): ni bcad pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs rabs kyang 'chang // de bas rang gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni// de ni khyad du mi gsad cing // de la legs par bag kyang bya// rgyal rigs dpe byad/ 
293b3('dul ba): ldan pa dang // de bzhin brang 'gro ma dang ni// dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la// blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya// de bas rang gi srog srung zhing // rang gi don la lta bas ni// de la khyad du mi gsad cing // 
293b4('dul ba): de la legs par bag kyang bya// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal nga rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon pa dga' ste/ rje su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
293b5('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
293b6('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhugaso// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring yig bskur ba/ lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/ bdud rtsos 'gro ba/ 
293b7('dul ba): tshim par byed do zhes spring pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung ngo // gnyis pa btang ba dang / de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ste/ pho nya gang dang gang btang
293b8('dul ba): ba de dang de dag nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa la 'gram pa btad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag nyid
294a1('dul ba): du legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung ngo snyam nas/ sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa/ 'char kas mthong nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal
294a2('dul ba): gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ 'char ka gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe/ kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho'i gan
294a3('dul ba): du 'ongs nas/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dir bzhugaso zhes smra'o// da ni kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang 'phrin khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems
294a4('dul ba): khongasu chud par mi 'gyur/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha ba/ dag mi cha ste bka' bzhin 'tshal nas slar mchi'o// rgya/ la po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ 'char ka gang dang gang song ba
294a5('dul ba): de de'i ston pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur/ ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do// 'char kas smras pa/ lha
294a6('dul ba): slar mtshal gso// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis 'brin yi ge bris pa/ lhum su zhugs pa bzung nas su// khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te// nyon mongs me rab 'bar bzhin du/ 
294a7('dul ba): rgyal po ljon shing la bsdang na// da ni khyod kyi slob ma yin// yal ga lcug ma 'phel gyur pas// gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar gyur// bdag ni sdug bsngal skal ba ldan// gzhan yang gang
294a8('dul ba): gis khyod ni ljon shing lkug phran mtshungs tsam na// bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te// bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yong su spyad thob na// de la yon tan 'bras
294b1('dul ba): bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med// gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na// nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni// shin tu che thang phan gdags zhes// khyod kyi dam bca' mdzad nas ni// khyod kyis zhi gnas de
294b2('dul ba): rnyed na// bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams la// thugs brtse rjesu zung mdzod de// gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// zhes spring pa'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas chas te rim gyis mnyan
294b3('dul ba): yod du phyin pa dang / lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol ba'i yi ge lag so zhes bcom ldan
294b4('dul ba): 'das la yi ge phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ba zhes nas bklag so// bklags nas yi ge mtha' gci dag tu gzhag pa dang / 'char kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
294b5('dul ba): 'das ci ljags/ ser skya'i gzhir mi gzhung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka 'dong ngo // 2char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas
294b6('dul ba): de sngon gyi 'dris pa kho nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang / bdag gi mthus bkri bar bgyi lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal
294b7('dul ba): pa/ gang zhig yul gyi rgyal por ma chags shing // sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// gang
294b8('dul ba): zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing // sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i// sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mnga' de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// gang zhig bcom/ 
295a1('dul ba): nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing // 'jig rten ma bcom srung zad yod min pas// sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri/ 
295a2('dul ba): gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing // 'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa// sangs rgyas mtha' yos pa yi rtsal mnga' de// gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri// lan la/ 
295a3('dul ba): spobs pa med nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang la rig par bya'o// 'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no// 'char kas
295a4('dul ba): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang rab tu byung shig/ bcom da ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam
295a5('dul ba): bcas lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung la ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems
295a6('dul ba): dbar gyur pa na yab dang yum dang mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang bla ma'i gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang 'thun pa'i tshig lan 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go// 'char kas gsol
295a7('dul ba): pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'char ka 'di ni yun ring po'i don dang / 
295a8('dul ba): phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rab tu phyung shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyen nas 'char ka rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs
295b1('dul ba): par byas te/ kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag de la rgyas par smras nas 'char ka 'di ni khyod kyi bya ba yin te/ deng phan chad bud med dang lhan cig tu khang pa cig tu nyal bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba dag go/ 
295b2('dul ba): btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na bo der song ste phyin pa dang
295b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir mchi lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
295b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka song la khyod do mod kho nar rgya la po'i khab tu ma 'jug par sgo na sdongad la shAkya'idage slong 'ong so zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te nang du spyon cig/ 
295b5('dul ba): ces gleng na 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas gal te shAkya 'i dge slong gzhan yang yod dam zhes zer na/ yod do/ zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub
295b6('dul ba): pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/ 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o// khyod kyis rgyal po'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don tham
295b7('dul ba): cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes gleng na mi bzhugaso zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gang du gnas par byed ces 'dri na dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang
295b8('dul ba): du'o zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa bris te bstan par bya'o// gal te gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam
296a1('dul ba): zhes 'drin/ byon no zhes brjod par bya'o// ji srid cig na byon zhes 'drin zhag bdun lon na'o// zhes brjod par bya'o// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchi lags so// 
296a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa song shig/ sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te// lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing // de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyi// sems bskyed pas ni thams
296a3('dul ba): cad 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom
296a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzad pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis so zhes gsol cig/ de rnams
296a5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ tsi shAkya'i dge slong gzhan dag kyang yod dam/ shes ldan dag yod do// de rnams kyis rgyal po la smra sa pa/ shAkya'i dge slong mchi so// rgyal pos smras pa/ 
296a6('dul ba): nang du thong shig/ de nang du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'char ka rab tu byung ngam/ des smras pa lha rab tu byung ngo // khyod slar 'ong ngo zhes smra ba ma yin nam/ 'di/ 
296a7('dul ba): ci yin/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no bka' stsal nas/ chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung mod kyi/ bdag
296a8('dul ba): rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung ngo // rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud bstan bshams pa nyid la 'dug du bcug ste/ de'i don du chu brtags pa gtsang ma dang / 'bras bu brtags pa
296b1('dul ba): gtsang sbra byas te zar bcug go// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rje su bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yong su longs spyad do// rgyal pos de la bca
296b2('dul ba): nas ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa 'char gcig zhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba yin nam/ 'char kas smras pa/ lha bdag gi dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba ni chung zad tsam
296b3('dul ba): lag so// dper na ji lta bu/ ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no// rgya mtsho dang tshig rjes bzhin no// nyi ma dang srin bu me khyer bzhin no// namakha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i bug bzhin no// rgyal po zas gtsang
296b4('dul ba): smras par/ 'char ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/ lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad la dadi 'dra'o// rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal nas sa la 'gyel pa
296b5('dul ba): dang / chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar byung ste smras pa/ 'cha ra ka gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/ 'char kas smras pa byon no// dus ji srid cig na dgung bdun lon
296b6('dul ba): na'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis/ rgyal po'i khab dang pho brang byi dor gyis shig/ 'char kas
296b7('dul ba): smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad do// rgyal pos smras pa gang du gzhugs/ 'char kas smras pa/ dgon pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang du'o// rgyal po zas gtsang
296b8('dul ba): gis smras pa/ 'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to// de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ 
297a1('dul ba): shes lhan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu bcig tu chug shig/ lha dka'
297a2('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu
297a3('dul ba): brtsig tu bcug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u dgal gyi bu song la/ dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das
297a4('dul ba): ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/ yab sras gdan 'dzem na/ khyed cag las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos long shig/ ces bsgo shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal
297a5('dul ba): zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom lda na 'das la mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gshegs te/ 
297a6('dul ba): yab sras gdan 'jom na/ khyed cag las su lta bar spro ba de chos gos ngag long shig ces bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul bzhi pa 'khor zhi ba/ grol ba 'khor
297a7('dul ba): grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa/ 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dag bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ 'khor 'dod chags dang
297a8('dul ba): bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog pa glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po che phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng+ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor
297b1('dul ba): blta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ namakha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa mkhas pa nang pa'i tshogs kyis
297b2('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'dron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal phran blon
297b3('dul ba): po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor lo sgyur ba bu stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor bu lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor
297b4('dul ba): skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po dgrul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzad klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi
297b5('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thag bzangs ris lha ma yi na gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris
297b6('dul ba): kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po dam pa dreg pa dang bral ba lta bu/ dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrug
297b7('dul ba): pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas
297b8('dul ba): lhag po'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po
298a1('dul ba): dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu 'bab chu ro hi kar byon to// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa/ 'bab chu ro hi kar byon
298a2('dul ba): to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang / gyo mo dang gsog ma rnams bsal nas/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btag/  dri shin tu zhim po'i bog
298a3('dul ba): phor nye bar bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyangs mang po bcangs te/ gang yang 'bab chu ro hi ka nas/ gang yang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/ sa phyogs
298a4('dul ba): yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bkra ba dag shom du bcug go// de nas 'bab chu ro hi ka la dge slong kha cig/  ni lag pa 'khru bar byed/ kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar
298a5('dul ba): byed do// kha cig ni khrus byed do// ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa gshegaso zhes thos so// thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon
298a6('dul ba): gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul/ kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes nas thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag
298a7('dul ba): byed pa lha'o snyam mo// / 'dul ba gzhi// bam po go gcig pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te// gol te nga zhabs kyis ser skya'i gzhir go she
298a8('dul ba): ni/ shAkya nga rgyal can rnams/ kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nagasu gshegs nas lhong po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/ de lnga brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring
298b1('dul ba): byas nas steng gi na mkha' las gshegs te dus de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas/ bdud rtsi thob nas de zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dang bskyeng bar 'gyur snyam nas/ de nas bcom
298b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/ shar phyogs kyi stong gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / bzhengs
298b3('dul ba): pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal bar mdzad do// me'i ting 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad do// me'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
298b4('dul ba): sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar pod/ dang / dkar po dang / lebargan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag
298b5('dul ba): gau/ cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad do// sku'i smad na sa 'bar bar mdzad la/ sku'i stong nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'beb par mdzad do// sku'i stong nas 'bar bar mdzad la/ 
298b6('dul ba): sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzod pa de lta bu'i tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang nub dang byang phyogasu yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu
298b7('dul ba): 'phrul gyi cho phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du mdzad pa bsdus te/ ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs// dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o// 
298b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams lnga'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid
299a1('dul ba): tsam na ni/ dge slong rnam gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsaman ni/ dge slong rnam gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam
299a2('dul ba): na ni// dge slong rnams ta la gcig gi srid na'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na ni/ dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das drug gi snyid tsam na ni/ 
299a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams ni srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gsum gyi srid tsam na'o// 
299a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams mi gang lhag tsam na'o// btso/ 
299a5('dul ba): ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsam na ni/ dge slong rnams sa la'o// rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de lta bu de dang dge slong mang po mthong nas/ de la bcom ldan 'das gang
299a6('dul ba): yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ 'char ka 'dri na ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba mang po zhig yod na/ de la gzhon nu gang yin tshe dang
299a7('dul ba): ldan pa char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags/ srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags// 'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad
299a8('dul ba): nyid byed de nyid don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags// 'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags// dri med gsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug
299b1('dul ba): khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang gzigs shig// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus btung nas zhabs la phyag byas te/ tshigasu bcang pas gsol pa/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di na/ 
299b2('dul ba): kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltam pa'i che nas ni g.yos pa dang // 'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o// de nas shAkya dang / shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po
299b3('dul ba): zas gotsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa mthong nas/ da ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa tso tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed do// rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya
299b4('dul ba): shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad ces smraso// / shes ldan dag gdod kho bos gzhon nu don tham das cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/ gang
299b5('dul ba): gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa na/ sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing / 'jig rten 'di thams cang snang ba rgya chen pos gsalo bar gyur te/ 'jig rten na 'jig
299b6('dul ba): rten gyi bar gyi mun gnag smag tu gyur pa/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyam su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal
299b7('dul ba): bar gyur nas/ der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can gang dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dang 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/ shes ldan dag
299b8('dul ba): 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes ngo shis par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas so// gang gi tshe gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa// 
300a1('dul ba): zhing las kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na/ shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs pas/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa
300a2('dul ba): dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/ shing gzhan
300a3('dul ba): rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogasu gzhol shar phyogasu 'bab/ shar phyogasu bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe yang ngo mtshar
300a4('dul ba): rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/ bcom ro ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/ 'di dang dbacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas so// 
300a5('dul ba): de bas ni 'di skad ces/ blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni / kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/ bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang // 'dzam bu'i grib
300a6('dul ba): ma sku las ma 'das pa'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon pa'ang mdzad pa de brtul nas// 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi dge
300a7('dul ba): 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad 'dzer cing snying dang mig mchi mas gang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcang ba'i dbyangs
300a8('dul ba): kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las// yab kyi khab na bzhugs pa las// dgon pa'i 'jigs dang bcas rnamasu// ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs// bcom ldan
300b1('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mi yi bdag po gang du ni// khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba// 'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcu// thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad// rgyal pos gsol pa/ 
300b2('dul ba): so gser gyi rtsa ba can// shin tu bde ba bting ba yi// khri la mnal bar mdzad pa las// gding ba la ni ji ltar mnal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po rnam grol gnas mal ni/ 
300b3('dul ba): dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/ me tog bkram par chags med cing // yongasu gdung ba rnam spangs mnal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi khab na ni// gser dngul bum
300b4('dul ba): pas khrus mdzad na// rnyog pa can la dro ba yi// chab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis// bka' stsal pa// go'u ta ma dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med
300b5('dul ba): bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan rmed bkrus nas// lus mi gshe ra bar pha rol rab tu rgal// rgyal po zas gtsang gis
300b6('dul ba): gsol pa// dpa' bo khyod sngon gser skya yi// tsan+d+ra gyis ni sku bskus shing // ka shi'i mchog gnas mdzes pa lags// de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
300b7('dul ba): stsal pa// tshul khrims nga yi rgyan yin to// tshul khrims nyid ni byug pa yin// gser dang nor bu rna cha dag/ rmongs bskyed nga la ci zhig bya// rgyal pos gsol pa/ dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang na// 
300b8('dul ba): glang po shing rta rtas bzhud pa// cher mar bcas pa'i sa gzhi la// zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang // 
301a1('dul ba): yang dag grol ba'i gzhon pa yis// sa kun rnam par rgyun yang // nyon mongs cher mas gnod pa med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi
301a2('dul ba): ka'i/ Shan bza' ban bas na mdzes pa las// ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos banabs pa// ji ltar khyod kyi sku yis bzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes// 
301a3('dul ba): nga yi bgo ba rnam sbyar te// de bgos thub pa zhi ba rnams// nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ 'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa nas/ du ma'i ro
301a4('dul ba): ldan 'bras can gsol ba las// 'di ltar gtso bo da lta'i dbasod snyoms ni// phal ba gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zas
301a5('dul ba): kyi sred pa thams cad spangs nas ni// nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i// nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi// 'jig rten kun la brtse phyir nga spyod do// 
301a6('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gi gsol pa// mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i// dgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol na// rnyog pa can la dro ba yi// cha ba ni ji ltar zhig tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
301a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa// mi yi bdag po gang 'thungs na// bdag la btung ba thams cad ni// dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa// chos kyi ro mchog nga btung ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// 
301a8('dul ba): 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang // khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs// da ltar gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa// blo bzangs ji ltar bsnyengs pa
301b1('dul ba): med par bzhugs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// go'u tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin de// dri ma brag chags bcas par ngas spangs pas// nga la mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas
301b2('dul ba): te/ ngal 'di na 'jigs pa chung zad med// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/ khyod sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ong bar// khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsil na// gcig rngu
301b3('dul ba): khyod ni nags khrod gnas ldan par// thub dbang da ltar su yis khrus mdzad 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// go'u ta ma chos kyi mtshe bran dri med pa// tshul khrims 'jug
301b4('dul ba): ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste// de la rig pa'i yon tan da mi bkrus na// lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu \u0f7f/ la// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// gang gis khyod
301b5('dul ba): ni khyad du gsod // gang las 'jig su rung ba ste// yid 'byung ba yang gang las skye// zhus pa de dag bdag la/ gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang
301b6('dul ba): gis nga ni khyad gsod dang // gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang // gang las yid byung skyes pa dag/ nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya// rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste// gal te 'di gsum yod
301b7('dul ba): min na// nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i// yul rnams la ni dga' bar 'gyur// rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa// shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba// legs par 'khrungs pa'i dpa'
301b8('dul ba): bo legs// khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis// ji lta bur yang ma gos so// de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas// drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byas nas ni// thub pa'i zhabs
302a1('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te// bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bus yon+dan gyi tshogs
302a2('dul ba): 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gis rnyed po legs par brnyed do snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang
302a3('dul ba): rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas zas dkar la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri bdun stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas
302a4('dul ba): te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ni ma gtog so// lha sbyin nga rgyal can las kyang nga rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma byas pas/ khro bo'i kun nas bkris pa dang
302a5('dul ba): bcas pas smras pa/ gal te bdag gis 'od 'dra ba'i sgyu mas dbang du byed par shes na/ bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad dbang du bya ba zhig de la shAkya rnams
302a6('dul ba): kyis bshos pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ lha sbyin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma smra shig/ ces bzlog nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// tshangs pas bskor ba'i
302a7('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par bre bo zas la sogs pa shAkya drug khri drug stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum
302a8('dul ba): du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro// ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma gtogs par/ bdud rtsi zas la
302b1('dul ba): sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro// 'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub
302b2('dul ba): tu sems bskyed do// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do// kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
302b3('dul ba): bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra
302b4('dul ba): bcom par gyur/ kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la skyobs su dasong / kha cig gis ni chos la/ kha cig gis ni dge 'du na la ste/ 'khor de dag kyang phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol/ 
302b5('dul ba): chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas rgya la po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon ni bco/ ma ldan 'das lha dang lha ma yin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas/ 
302b6('dul ba): mchod pa dang rjed pa dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/ da lta ni mis mchod kyi lhas ni ma yin no snyam mo// de nas shAkya gzhon nu zhig gis tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/ drang srong chen po
302b7('dul ba): smra mchog dam chos kyis// char pas 'gro ba 'di ni tshim mdzad de// mi bzang lam du ltung ba'i 'jig rten 'di// drongs te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod// rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di
302b8('dul ba): snyam du bdag gis bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' bas bde ba ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po
303a1('dul ba): zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa ma mthong snyam pa las de 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/ lhag par dga' ba las
303a2('dul ba): gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa spong du bzhug go// rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ ha cang zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba'o// de la zhum pa'i sems dang / shin tu dga' ba
303a3('dul ba): yid kyis ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang / shin tu dga' ba gnyis spong du bzhug go snyam nus/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dag
303a4('dul ba): gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig btsun pa bka' debazhin 'tshal zhis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu che na pos/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rgyal po zas
303a5('dul ba): gtsang gang na ba der song ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po na sa 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag
303a6('dul ba): gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa leg so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gdan gshams
303a7('dul ba): nyid la bzhugs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag na rang
303a8('dul ba): gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/ spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de 'di lta ste/ 'chag pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 1la/ 
303b1('dul ba): bar byed do// me'i ting 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed do// me'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs
303b2('dul ba): ngag 'byin par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog dag go// cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/ lus kyi smad nas 'bar ba
303b3('dul ba): byed la/ lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do// lus kyi stong nas 'bar bar byed la/ lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// 
303b4('dul ba): shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang daphyogasu yang de bzhin no// phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gzhi bstan nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par
303b5('dul ba): 'du bya ba bsdus te/ gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa mo
303b6('dul ba): dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'i ltar maskyel lnga sa lags sam/ rgyal po chen po mchi so zhes tshig su bcad de smras pa/ mthu che ba dang gsum rig
303b7('dul ba): dang / sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang // zag zad dag bcom gang yin pa// thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis bu 'ba' zhig
303b8('dul ba): 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che zhing ma zad de/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing che ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas/ de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to// skabs
304a1('dul ba): der bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ kye ma brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na/ lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos
304a2('dul ba): bshad do snyam pa dang / chos nyid kyis gang gis tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog sbur rnams kyi sems
304a3('dul ba): kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na brgya byin dang / chad pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed
304a4('dul ba): pa de'i tshe nyan thos chen po rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa mi shes na brgya byin dang tshangs pa la so/ gas te lha rnams lta ci smos/ srog chags grog sbur rnams
304a5('dul ba): kyis lta ga la shes de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di/ snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'a/ jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las/ de 'di
304a6('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed do snyam nas/ de nas lha'i bu bzo thams cad pa la bsgo ba bzo thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la
304a7('dul ba): chos 'chad par bzhed kyis/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar/ rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul cig/ ko'u shi ka/ khyod kyi mchog tu bzang ngo / 
304a8('dul ba): zhes lha'i bu bzo thams cad pas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsig ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul
304b1('dul ba): to// de la rgyal po chen po bzhi sgo bzhin 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lus ngan po dang / shar sgron ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang / rna cha gdu
304b2('dul ba): 'khor dang / phreng ba dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyos po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// nub phyogs na ni mig ma bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan
304b3('dul ba): pa'o// byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang nab
304b4('dul ba): der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par ga/ sol to// de nas bcom ldan 'ongs brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskom
304b5('dul ba): nas khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs te/ lha'i 'khor phal po che'i gung la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sa ng+ge'i khri la bzhug so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi chu
304b6('dul ba): chen pos/ rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po
304b7('dul ba): chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro bar sdod cig ces bzlog go// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag po la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi
304b8('dul ba): dbang ngo // bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa
305a1('dul ba): rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'phags
305a2('dul ba): skyes pa'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nu bsgo song ba dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi ba
305a3('dul ba): gis mthong nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po
305a4('dul ba): zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi dbus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug parasdod cig/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs
305a5('dul ba): khyod su zhig/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bad ga ni rnam thos kyi bu'o// ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/ der mir gyur pa
305a6('dul ba): 'jug tu mi dbang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang kye ma'o// bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de/ bdag gis lta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes so// de nas rgyal po zas
305a7('dul ba): gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de bral bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na/ khrag dron mo skyugs na 'chi bar 'gyur
305a8('dul ba): ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis/ de la thabs shig bshams par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las/ 
305a9('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/ mig mi bzang gis smras ga rgyal po chen po bdag ni mig mi bzang ngo // 
305b1('dul ba): byas par sprul pa dang / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
305b2('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 
305b3('dul ba): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas rgyal po zas gtsang gis 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi
305b4('dul ba): rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon su dam du byas te/ de bden pa mthong nas/ lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag la phas
305b5('dul ba): ma bgyis mas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis mi lags/ sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma la gas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags/ sdug pa dang
305b6('dul ba): rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni
305b7('dul ba): bskal/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bskum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go// yang gsol pa/ pha la lan du phan gdags pa// dam pa'i
305b8('dul ba): bus ni bgyi ba gang // khyod kyis bdag la mdzad la ste// sems ni grol bar gzhol bar bgyis// khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las// drangs te mtho ris thar pa la// bsgrim mi 'chal bar
306a1('dul ba): gzhag lags te// khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs// mgon po'o byams khyod kyis ni// bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar// mtho ris rnyed pas srid pa yis/ longs spyod dag
306a2('dul ba): ni rnyed par mdzad// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
306a3('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan
306a4('dul ba): 'das rgyal po zas gtsang ma la cang mi gsung bas gan rang ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das ca rang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
